1.content: Which Type of story would you like to read?
1.title: Story Selection

111.content:
Princess Zelda after sneaking out of the castle went browsing around Hyrule Castle Market. She browsed nearly every stand in the market even though most of them sell the exact same things for weeks sometimes for months.

So Zelda knew what and where to check in the market. Just before she was about to leave a new booth caught her eye. Zelda walked up to the strange booth. There was an old woman selling bottles with potions in them.

"Welcome young lady what would you like to buy?" the old woman said.

"Um, I would first like to know what it is you sell here?" Zelda asked.

"Ah yes of course I sell potions that naturally make you stronger and wiser." the old woman replied showing the princess various bottles and vials. Zelda was a little intrigued by one of the potions the old woman showed her.

"I'll buy this one then." Zelda said. After making her purchase she walked toward the back alley and quickly uncorked the bottle she took a quick whiff of it.

"Eww! This stuff smells horrible but if It’ll make me stronger..." Zelda said as reluctantly she gulped down the entire contents of the bottle.
111.title: Powerful Potion

1112.content:
Zelda gagged as she swallowed the putrid potion. She felt a slight gurgle in her stomach drank it. Her body felt ice cold she saw that her skin and her dress started to glow a light whitish tint.

She did notice that for some reason her gloves did not glow. The light disappeared as well the icy chill she had. Zelda examined her self for a second.

"I don't look different. And I don't feel different." Zelda said to herself. Zelda turned toward the potion shop to ask the old woman about the potion. To her surprise the entire booth was gone as if it was never there.

"What happened to this booth, I know it was here before?" She asked herself. Her train of thought was interrupted by a noise. Zelda identified the sound as her stomach growling. She obviously worked up an appetite for some odd reason.
1112.title: It starts with hunger.

11121.content:
Zelda did not eat anything the entire day so she decided to eat something. Zelda went to a produce booth and saw a couple large red apples. Zelda approached the booth owner.

"Your highness how may I help you?" the owner asked

"Yes I would like to buy 3 apples please?" Zelda asked "Of course princess here you go." the owner said After that Zelda paid him she started eating the apples. Now Zelda normally measured at the height of about 5'11 but after that first bite she was now 6'2 and after her next bite she was 6'5 and so on.

Of course growing at such a slow rate Zelda had no knowledge of her spurts. By the time she was finished with the apples she was nearly twelve feet tall. Still unaware of this Zelda went to another booth.

"Ummm... Pr-Princess c-could I he-help y-you?" the owner of the booth said trembling.

"What's wrong with you?" Zelda said looking down at the owner.

"N-Nothing wrong with me now what do you want to buy?" he asked her. "I'll buy a banana bunch." Zelda said. By now Zelda was drawing so much attention with her large presence.

Zelda looked at the (tiny well at least to her) bananas and ate them all in one bite. Slowly she shot up another twenty feet. She was soon was as taller as most of the buildings in town. Zelda noticed that her gloves were staring too rip. Before long they were in shreds.

Also her feet were very cramped after awhile her shoes burst into a pieces. Leaving her barefeet on the hard stone ground. Her gold gear(earrings,chains and such) didn't grow along with her and broke off as well. This left Zelda only in her dress.

She after all this Zelda was no longer hungry but her thirst started to grow. Soon all she could think of was liquid. She thought of places were she could get something to drink.
11121.title: Her  HIGHness

choices: She leaves the lake for now
111212.content:
Zelda needed liquid and she needed it fast. 'What's wrong with me...all I think of is liquids. I'm so thirsty...' and with a second thought Zelda bolted out of town toward the Lake.

Normally a trip to Lake Hylia on foot would take several hours but now that Zelda was somewhere between 35-40 ft. tall she was there before she knew it.

Already seeing the upcoming Lake, Zelda broke into a spirit and completely destroyed the iron gate to the Lake with one stomp. She stopped just before the coastline and licked her wet lips and instantly placed her mouth into the water.

As she drank and drank Zelda unknowingly did not feel her body continue to grow upward. Her arms and legs grew longer and longer with each drink. Her chest and torso also grew bigger and bigger as did her head. Also lucky for her, her dress seemed to keep up with the rest of her growing body.

Minutes passed on and Zelda had drank about 1/4 of the Lake. She slowly lifted her head as well as the rest of her body and stood at her full height about 200 ft. tall.

"Wow now that was a good drink." said Zelda happily and oblivious to her height. A few seconds passed and Zelda noticed that her surroundings seemed different, it was then she got a look of her body in the water's reflection.

"My Goddesses...I'm huge! But how...wait it must have been that potion. As well as the food and the water. I must have drank a little too much water..." said Zelda to herself.

"I wonder though have the effects worn off now that I've had my full of water..." she then glanced at the lake before her wondering if she should test her theory.
111212.title: Lots of water

1112121.content:
Zelda was a little curious about her theroy she bent back down and began to drink more water. This time she scanned the area while she drank absolutely nothing happened during her little(or should I say big) drink. When she stopped she spat all the water back in the lake.

"Maybe it only works when I'm thirsty?" Zelda thought to herself. She looked down at the lake traces of her saliva covered the surface. Plus her first drink left the lake looking pretty empty.

Zelda left the lake her giant figure could be seen from anyplace in hyrule. She made her way across the field. She was right near Lon Lon ranch when she felt something inside her she started to yell in pain.

Her voice began to echo across the entire land. Windows broke ,animals screamed and the people began run into their homes. Zelda then felt something strike her in the chest she fell to the ground completely unconscious.

Zelda's humongus body began to glow black then a form just as huge as Zelda emerged from her body. She looked exactly like Zelda except she hand short thin brown hair, her dress had a greenish tint it, her eyes had a blood red color to them,and her skin tone was much darker.

The Dark Zelda examined herself then examined Zelda who was still unconscious. She then set her eyes on Hyrule castle. With an evil grin on her face she slowly walked toward it crushing anything she wanted on the way.
1112121.title: The Dark Zelda.

choices: She attacks the castle outright and bring it to the ground!
She gets every last one of them, but spare the castle.
11121211.content:
Glaring down at peasants who were traveling the roads of Hyrule, Dark Zelda took a disaproving look upon all she passed. Until of course she brought her flat soled boot down upon them or their wares.

Unlike Zelda, the dark version had more of an adventurers clothes. She had laced up boots, and a tightly tied dress that was tinted green. Her short brown hair was a constrast to Zelda's that gave her a wanderers look too. Grinding a destroyed wagon under her boot as the confused and scared fat little owner wearing a merchants smock cried up to her.

A grin passed over the wicked girls face as her attention was once again drawn to the spiraling towers of Hyrule.

"It must all be destroyed," A voice of echoing and reverberating cruelty came from the titanic dark form of the evil princess.

Stomping forward, the trim and lanky giantess made slow progression toward the castle. Taking the time to destroy anything in her path. Even occasionally stopping to grab the odd Hyrulian and scarf them up into her hungry mouth. She felt like she hadn't eaten in forever. Had it been that long that her energy had been welling up and eager to escape into the world?

Passerbys could only stare in wonder as the casually stumbling mountain of a beautiful girl moved toward their beloved kingdom.

Worst of all, to the residents of the land, it looked like their own adored princess Zelda!
11121211.title: Dark Zelda's march to Hyrule castle

choices: Something hits her in the back.
111212111.content:
When she finally approaced the castle she proceeded to destroy everything. She quickly stomped,crushed, and flattened anything that wasn't ground level it wasn't before long that the entire market was a humongous pile of flatten debris.

She smiled with satisfaction but that evil smile quckily changed once she saw the main castle in sight. Just the thought of it downright disgusted her. She gave out a terrible scowl the echoed throughout the kingdom. She slowly walked toward the castle crushing any gates in her way.

Soon hundreds of guards came pouring out of the castle ready to give their lives for the castle and all inside it. Dark Zelda just laughed at their pitiful attempt to hurt her.

The slashed their swords at her boots, threw their spears at her ankles and they shot thier arrows at her legs but all to no avail.
111212111.title: Bye-Bye castle.

1112121111.content:
Dark Zelda just lifted her titanic boot and slammed it down crushing and killing hundreds of them single handed. Not to her surprise they began to run in fear.

"You insects aren't going anywhere." She said smashing all of them in a berserk rage. When she was finished all of them were dead. The ground as well as her boots were covered in blood.

The market was not a desolate deserted wasteland. There was no sound now life just the sound of the wind blowing and Dark Zelda's breathing. She set her sights at the castle it stood almost evenly as tall as she was she knew there was still life inside. That caused her to give off a disgusted scoff.

As she approached it she was interrupted by a loud noise. Turned around and saw standing in the distance....
1112121111.title: The soldiers stand no chance.

choices: She continues to mess with Link.
She continues her mission to destroy all.
11121211111.content:
Dark Zelda turned only to see Link standing in the distance. He drew his blade and was prepared to fight her off. However the giant dark princess saw no challenge in his puny frame.

"Go bother someone else you pest." she yelled. Her voice was as loud a thunderstorm causing Link to cover his ears. He then readied his bow and fired several arrows at the evil giant. Without much effort Dark Zelda dodged all but the last are which didn't even prick her skin.

"Damn, she's too strong!" Link thought to himself. He then fired a light arrow at her body, hoping its holy powers could destroy the dark menace. However the arrow just bounced off her skin like a rubber band.

"You’re boring me!" Dark Zelda said as she puckered her lip and blew as stream of air Link. Link quickly slipped on his heavy Iron boots but the gust was so powerful it still knocked him in the air. Dark Zelda was toying with him and he had no chance of winning the fight. She let out a deep echoing cackle that could be heard anywhere in the kingdom.

Dark Zelda has a mission to destroy everything but does continue her destruction?
11121211111.title: Dark Zelda vs. Link

choices: ... Raised the mask to his face...
... Caught sight of something else... the real Zelda!
111212111111.content:
Dark Zelda's face split in an evil grin as she slowly started walking to the winded hero. Each of her thunderous steps threatened to knock poor Link off his feet. Link gritted his teeth as she came closer, desperately trying to think of a way to defeat his opponent. All of the monsters he had faced before had a specific weakness, something he could exploit. However, this new threat seemed to have no openings.

"Now little man... you will die!" laughed Dark Zelda.

Link watched in horror as she lifted one large boot-clad foot over him, its large shape blocking out the sun. As she brought her foot down with a crushing force, Link barely managed to roll out of the way. Dark Zelda simply smiled and raised her foot again, toying with the small hero.

"I may only have one shot at this," thought Link.

Link quickly unslung his bow and took aim with a fire arrow, at the same time emptying his mind as he called upon Dyn's Fire. As Dark Zelda brought her foot down again, Link released his arrow, striking the sole of her boot. Suddenly Dark Zelda's foot burst into flame as Dyn's Fire erupted from the arrow. Dark Zelda yelled in response and began teetering backwards, trying to extinguish the fire. Acting quickly, Link shot his Longshot at her opposite foot, he dug his Iron Boots deeply into the ground and pulled with all his might. He felt the strength flow from the Golden Gauntlets he wore as Dark Zelda began to lose her balance. With one last mighty heave, Dark Zelda fell to the ground in a resounding crash that shook foundations.

"No time..." thought Link, as he took careful aim. He reared back and tugged on the Longshot, letting himself be pulled off his feet as the chain retracted. Using the momentum he vaulted onto Dark Zelda's leg and began running towards her face as fast as he could.

Dark Zelda was not impressed, not only had the puny man managed to damage her boots, but he had humiliated her. She carefully rubbed the back of her head as she raised her head. Suddenly she caught a glimpse of light out of the corner of her eye. She gasped as she saw the small man launch himself into the air over her breasts with an arrow gleaming with holy light knocked in his bow. The arrow flew straight and true as it hit her left eye. Dark Zelda screamed in pain as she felt the light burn and clutched at her face.

Link managed to land on the ground with only a little damage and scrambled away as the giantess started thrashing about in pain. While the arrow did damage her, it did not have the affect that Link hoped it would. Dark Zelda was in pain, but she was still as strong and menacing as ever. She slowly rose up, covering her left eye while her right burned with fury.

With that last move, Link was out of options. Suddenly he remembered an item he had picked up traveling in Termina. Slowly and carefully he drew out the Fierce Deity's Mask. Most of the masks he had obtained in his travels had been carefully stored away. However, he did not dare to let this one out of his sight. He remembered the one time he had dared to put it on and shuddered in fear. He remembered being completely overcome with power, and anger. Ever since then he felt as if someone else, another presence was continuously looking over his shoulder, a presence that radiated fury and uncontrollable power.

Link hesitated, waging a silent war with himself and was rudely brought back to reality by Dark Zelda jumping to her feet. With a deep breath Link...
111212111111.title: She continues to mess with Link.

choices: Continued the Damage Process, and continued Slashing away
Was then Overcome by the Darkness, and the mask stuck to his face
1112121111111.content:
Link quickly put the Dangerous Mask on, not having used it since he destroyed Majora's Mask in Termina, and screamed with pain from the transformation. A Few Minutes Later, Link awoke as the Fierce Deity form of himself. With the Fierce Deity Sword, he He was overcome with darkness.

Must, resist dark urge. Link thought. Must..destroy...imposter.

For the 2nd Time, and probably the last, he was able to break the Power of Darkness, and slashed the Dark Princess' Right Leg, completely off. Dark Zelda wailed in pain as she fell to the ground. Link...
1112121111111.title: The Fierce Diety's Strength....

1112121111112.content:
Off in the distance Link thought he saw something equally as large as his foe before him. The ground shook as thunderous footsteps came closer and closer to the destroyed castle town. Before long the beautiful, graceful, and gigantic figure of Hyrule's own Princess Zelda came into view. Link was at a loss of words.

"You!" Dark Zelda yelled pointing at the equally giant princess. There was something about Zelda's presence that made the dark Zelda even more upset than she was before. With her left eye still permanently closed due to Link's earlier attack, her right eye burned with more anger and hatred than ever before. However Zelda wasn’t the least bit intimidated

"I won't forgive what you've done y-you impostor!" Zelda yelled obviously angry. Of course she had a right to be since her beloved kingdom was being destroyed by some creature that dared imitate her form. Who or whatever this creature is she was the only one who was the proper size to stop it. She entered her fighting pose ready to destroy her evil clone. Way down below Link could only watch as the two giant princesses began to fight, as he silently cheered for Zelda's victory.

Obviously this fight will have two outcomes.
1112121111112.title: Two Princesses One Brawl

11121211111121.content:
No one in Hyrule had never before seen anything like the two giant Zeldas fighting. Each step of the two giantesses caused the ground to shake; several buildings that the Dark Zelda had left untouched until she finished with the castle were brought down by the tremors or by the bodies of the two giantesses when they moved or fell.

Link grimaced as he watched the fight. It was barely noticeable, but he knew what to look for, Zelda was losing. Dark Zelda’s shorter dress and hair were more suited for fighting, and Zelda wasn’t all that good at fighting to begin with.

Dark Zelda grabbed her opponent’s head and forced it down and forward before bringing her knee up, smashing it into Zelda’s nose. The dark giantess was rewarded with a sickening crunch as Zelda staggered back clutching her nose. Then Dark Zelda punched Zelda in the gut before kicking her on the side of the head. Zelda fell on her side and lay still for many long moments.

“Zelda! Get up!” Link shouted.

But Zelda didn’t. A black aura surrounded the two giantesses before Zelda suddenly disappeared. Link watched in horror as Dark Zelda’s aura faded and her left eye opened good as new. The evil giantess’s lips slit into a wide, evil, triumphant smile.

Dark Zelda then…
11121211111121.title: Dark Zelda Wins.

choices: Horror: The Goddess Hylia is descending before her ten times her size
Excitement: She's ready to destroy it all.
111212111111211.content: Dark Zelda merely smirked she felt a sense of joy wash over her, a very evil, demonic type of joy. She let out a soft chuckle that to Link sounded playful perhaps, yet had a SLIGHT hint of innocence to it, he fetl he was going crazy, he had to have been. He could only stare in both awe and terror as The Dark Princess began walking she merely stepped over him perhaps not seeing or just not caring about the little 'hero' However her mind was set somewhere else. Kokari Forest. As she easily walked through the forest she looked down at the "Children" below. But before she could say anything she let out a gasp of...
111212111111211.title: Continues her destructive mission

11121211111122.content:
As Zelda squared off agaisnt her large opponent she realized she wasn' going to win with her fists. Dark Zelda was too well built for that to work. She was going to have to use magic.

As she readied her first blow Dark Zelda came flying at her at amazing speed. Zelda barely managed to dodge the flying attack. When she passed Zelda fired a blast of Din's Fire at the dark imposter. It hit her square in the back and she fel to the ground destroying what was left of Castle Town.

Zelda grabbed the dark princess and used foroes wind to teleport away from the town. When Dark Zelda stirred she saw she was surrounded by sand in all directions. Zelda had teleported them to the middle of the Gerudo Desert.

As Dark Zelda thought of this she was hit in the small of her back with an incredible amount of energy. As Dark Zelda struggled to get up Zelda began blasting her with all sorts of magic until the Dark princess stopped struggling. As Zelda reached down and grabbed the shoulder of the dark Princess to make sure the monster was asleep,Dark Zelda began to fade into her,and getting smaller? As Zelda lookedaround she noticed the few Landmarks she could see getting smaller. When Zelda had fully absorbed Her evil counterpart she stood
11121211111122.title: Zelda Wins.

1112122.content:
Zelda thought about her theory if it was still in effect and she grew even larger she would accidentally crush things or people. Zelda just couldn't stop imagining herself tripping over a moutain and crushing her castle because she took a wrong step.

"That's not a good idea" Zelda said quietly. She was just as happy being as big as she was without being a serious threat. Then she thought of where to go next she was eager to explore her kingdom now that she was so big.

"I should go to see Link." After all I haven't seen him in a few days. Plus I bet he'd get a kick out of this." Zelda left the lake and walked across the field which took less time than before. Before she knew it she was in the Kokiri forest.

When she entered the forest most of the children ran inside their houses. Although she been to his house several times she did not know which house Link lived in. So she took a good look around and spotted a house that was difftent than the others it had a bridge conected to it.

"Maybe Link lives in there." Zelda thought She picked up the house and tuned it side ways and emptied it out. Tables,chairs,beds, and other furniture fell out before long a small Kokiri girl fell out of the house and landed in Zelda's palm. Zelda stared at the girl for a moment. She was cowering in fear.

"Don't worry I'm not going hurt you." Zelda said. The girl didn't even look at her. Zelda brought the girl closer to her face.

"Look I'm not going hurt you so calm down." The girl stopped and looked at Zelda.
"Alright" the girl said.

"What's your name?" Zelda asked her.

"S-Saria?" the girl replied

"Saria huh? Well Saria do you know where a boy named Link lives?" Saria pointed to Link's house. Zelda walked up to the house Saria pointed at. She crouched down and peered into the doorway.

But she was way to big to see inside. So she placed Saria on his porch. Could go inside and see if he's home. Saria walked inside for a second and came back out.

"He's not inside." Saria told Zelda. Zelda picked up Saria. "Your coming with me." I could use some company." Zelda said as she placed Saria on her shoulder.

"Wait a min-" Saria said but before she could decline Zelda started to walk off. While she was walking she was thinking of where to go next...
1112122.title: Searh for Link

11121221.content:
Zelda looked around. "LINK!" she shouted. Everyone in Hyrule looked up. Birds flew away. The forest trembled.

At The Deku Tree...

The yell shook the great tree. It also shook Link, who was talking to the giant tree.
"What was that?!?" Link said. "I don't know..." The Tree said. "I'm gonna go find out!" Link said, running towards the giant princess.
11121221.title: Could you have done that ANY louder?!?!

choices: Zelda shakes off the feeling and heads elsewhere.
111212211.content:
Still hearing the noises Link continued his search for the source of the sound. Eventually he could see Zelda's titanic form in the distance.

"How in the world did this happen?" Link said to himself. Zelda began to approached him. Link tried his absolute hardest to get Zelda's attention but she just couldn't spot him. Green clothes in a green forest probably didn't help much either.

"Link where are you?" Zelda said looking for him. Link jumped out of the way of Zelda's feet to avoid getting stepped on. Link quickly acted by grabbing the back of Zelda's dress. He clung on preparing for the ride of his life.

Zelda was fed up with looking for Link. She decided to leave the forest. As she left she started to feel sleepy it was only the early afternoon.
111212211.title: Link and the giant Princess.

1112122111.content:
Zelda gets as far as the entrance of the forest when the sleepy feeling catches her, so she sits down rather hard causing the Hyrule Fields the shake violently. Saria who was still on Zelda's shoulder at the time is sent flying into the branches of a nearby tree as Zelda lies down and falls fast asleep, snoring so loudly that she could even scare Ganondorf himself with the noise.

Saria calls out to Zelda, trying to wake her up. But she might aswell tell the tree she is trapped in to help her for all the good it would do.
Suddenly, over Zelda's loud snores, Saria hears a Horse neigh, looking down she sees...
1112122111.title: Triforce of Power or Courage?

11121221111.content:
Saria could see a sinister man in the distance approaching Zelda's face. Stopping there he took a good look at the titanic Princess and gave a good evil laugh and then he rode off.

"Who was that?" Saria said as she attempted to climb down from the high tree. After a couple of minutes of climbing she reached the ground. She ran to the point that Ganondorf was standing at before he took off.

What's this? Saria said noticing a strange colored fruit on the ground in front of Zelda. Saria was a little hungry but she wasn't sure if that that evil looking man dropped it or not.
11121221111.title: Strange fruit

choices: grows to the same size as Zelda
111212211111.content:
Thinking there is no harm in trying new things, Saria takes a big bite out of the fruit. It tastes sweeter then the sweetest of fruits. So Saria finishes off the rest of the multy coloured fruit.
Suddenly she feels a gurgling feeling in her stomach,
suddenly she...
111212211111.title: Fruit is good for you

1112122111112.content:
Saria's stomach felt as if she was on fire. Her vision blurred and she began to see spots. During all this Saria began to grow larger and larger until she was roughly the same size as the sleeping Zelda.

"OWWW!" Saria said yelling in pain. As the growing ceased Saria began to feel better. She gasped at the fact she was now humongous in comparison to the rest of the forest.

She made an attempt to wake up Zelda. But Zelda continued to sleep unaffected by Saria attempts.
1112122111112.title: Big Saria

11121221111121.content:
Saria's ears twitched a little she could hear what sounded like faint foot steps. Looking near the forest entrance she could see Link running toward her.

"SARIA WHAT HAPPENED TO YOU AND WHAT'S GOING ON HERE?" Link yelled up at her.

"You don't have to yell Link I can hear you just fine." Saria said quietly. She picked him up and placed him in her palm.

"What's going on first Zelda's giant now you are too." Link said. Saria could tell he was a little uneasy. She explained the whole deal with Zelda and the fruit.

"So how is it like being so big?" Link asked

Before Saria could answer...
11121221111121.title: Link shows up.

choices: She had reached the castle town and begun a monstrous rampage...
She was near the middle of Hyrule field and approaching Lon Lon Ranch.
111212211112.content:
As Saria looked at the fruit and ponders the merits of eating it, she senses movement behind her. She turned to see Zelda groaning, and slowly rising from her slumber.

"Zelda! Are you alright?" Saria shouted. This question remained unheard, however, as Zelda sat upright. It is at this point that Saria noticed that Zelda's eyes have an unusual red tint to them.

"Must... destroy... for the lord Gannondorf..." Zelda grumbled, completely devoid of emotion. She then stood and proceeded to stomp through the forest, destroying everything in her path and making a beeline for Hyrule Castle Town.

"Well... this can't possibly be good," Saria muttered. A horse's neighing distracted her. She turned around to find Link riding Epona, staring at the spectacle in abject horror.

"Link! We have to stop her before she destroys the castle," Saria shouted frantically. Link nodded in affirmation and assisted Saria onto his horse. They then rode off at a breakneck speed to catch up to the gigantic and destructive princess.

"Um... Link?" Saria asked, "HOW exactly are we going to stop her?"

Link thought about this for a moment, then shrugged and continued riding. By the time they reached Zelda...
111212211112.title: The Hero of Time to the Rescue

1112122111121.content:
Even as fast as Epona rode Zelda was far ahead it was no wonder that she was already destroying her own castle town by the time they reached her.

The monstrous Princess was destroying countless homes and shops all showing very little emotion. The villagers ran away from the town, screaming as loud as they could.

"What are we going to do?" Saria asked, "She too large for either of us to handle."

Link sat there on his horse pondering the situation. His train of thought was broken by a voice clearing it's throat.

"Perhaps I can be of assistance?" the voice who was revealed as Impa said. Both Link ans Saria were surprised to see Impa appear out of nowhere as she often does.

"Impa!" Link exclaimed, "Do you have an idea on how to stop Zelda?" Link said keeping his focus on the situation. Impa walked slowly toward the two, they both jumped off the Epona and Link sent her away to safety.

"I think we can lift this curse off Zelda, but I'll need time to prepare the spell." Impa stated, "In the meantime, I can enlarge one of you, so you can hold off her highness."

Link and Saria both looked at each other for a second before...
1112122111121.title: Zelda's Rampage

choices: Zelda and Saria are both growing more.
Gannondorf's influence shifts from Zelda to Saria.
11121221111212.content:
"I'll do it," Saria announced.

Link was surprised. "Saria, are you sure? I mean, I'm the one with the fighting ability. Maybe I should..."

"Exactly," Saria stated. "If you grow and fight her, it might lead to an epic battle that could get her hurt. All we need to do is distract her until Impa can remove her curse, and I'm probably better suited for that."

"Besides," she added with a wink, "being big looks like fun!"

Link was about to object, but decided now was not the time for arguments. "Fine," he conceded. "Impa, do your stuff."

Impa made some strange motions with her hands and muttered an incantation. Soon, Saria began to glow with an eerie green light.

"Wow... I feel funny!"

Saria immediately begins to grow higher and higher until she matched Zelda in height. Then, warily, she made her way to the gigantic, controlled princess.

"ZELDA! STOP! THINK OF WHAT YOU'RE DOING!" Saria boomed. Beneath her, hundreds of Hyrule citizens were running, terrified by the emmergence of this new giantess.

"I must destroy for the lord Gannondorf..." Zelda muttered, picking up the Happy Mask Shop and throwing it directly at Saria. Saria ducked and the shop flew into the back alleys, landing on the Bombchu store, starting a massive chain reaction causing the alleys of Hyrule Castle town to explode in a big fiery ball. "Wow... Link's not going to like this..." Saria gaped. She then ran over to Zelda, trying to forcibly restrain her from causing more destruction.

---

"HOLY MERCIFUL CRAP!" Link shouted, as he gazed upon the destruction of what was once the residential area of Hyrule Castle Town. "Link," Impa called out forcefully. "Go over there and help the survivors to safety. I'll prepare the spell to return Zelda and Saria to normal."

Link nodded and dashed towards the fiery wreckage, while Impa ran to a relatively safe corner and began her incantation.

---

Saria and Zelda, meanwhile, had engaged in a highly destructive wrestling match. Though Zelda was taller than Saria, Saria had an advantage in speed, from years of playing with her fellow Kokiri while Zelda was confined to the castle. As a result, the two were fairly evenly matched. Unfortunately, this spelled doom for the innocent bystanders, who were running in several different directions in a panic and often being crushed by Zelda and Saria alike.

Finally, after a long battle, Saria grabbed one of the apple carts in the market and smashed Zelda over the head with it. The blow to the head phased the princess enough that Saria was able to tackle her down to the ground and pin her, causing an incredible amount of destruction in the process as Zelda landed on a few buildings when she fell.

"Impa!" Saria called, "whatever you're about to do, do it now!"

---

As Link struggled to get people to safety, all the while planning to have a little chat with Saria later regarding the damage she caused, Impa was on the verge of completing her incantation, which would remove Gannondorf's influence over Zelda and shrink the two titans back to normal size. Unfortunately, just as she was about to finish the last syllable, Zelda came crashing down near her, knocking her to the other side of the market and knocking her unconcious.

---

Zelda suddenly screamed in pain and started to glow similarly to how Saria did.

"YES! WAY TO GO, IMPA!" Saria cheered. Her face then changed from relief to horror. "Oh no... something went wrong!"
11121221111212.title: Zelda-zilla versus Saria-dan

111212212.content:
Zelda kept yelling out Link's name. The voice echoed around the entire Kingdom of Hyrule it. But because of Zelda's size all it sounded like a low pitched roar.As Link left the Great Deku Tree's meadow he kept thinking about the loud noise.

"It sounds so familiar." Link thought to himself. Before long Link was standing in a deserted part of the forest. Suddenly hundreds of animals ran by Link. Before long Link could see the titanic princess walking through the forest.

"Holy Hyrule! Zelda is that you?" Link yelled. Zelda despite her large ears did not hear Link yelling. Zelda still seeing miles of forest ahead started running through out the forest franticly looking for Link. Link saw Zelda's colossal foot over his head before he new it her had been stomped flat by Zelda's foot. He was not dead lucky for him she out-grew her shoes or she might have killed him.

Link was bruised badly and unconscious. But he would be out for a few hours. Zelda didn't feel Link at all when she stepped on him. After all she had been stepping on trees rocks and other things. Zelda reached the end of the forest she looked back at the forest.

"Saria did you see him at all today." Zelda asked Saria who was still sitting on Zelda's shoulder.

"Yes but it was early he could have left the forest by now." Saria said. Zelda expression changed from worried to discouraged.

"Well I guess he's not here. We should probably leave for now." Zelda said in a sad tone.

"We? Wait aren't you going to take me home?" Saria asked

"What? You want to go home? But I want someone to keep me company. Don't you like it up here?" Zelda asked

"Well the it is pretty up here and the breeze is nice but-" Saria said before she was interrupted by Zelda.

Great I'll take you back to the castle." Zelda said.
111212212.title: Link faces the agony of da feet

choices: Zelda and Saria get to the Castle
1112122121.content:
Zelda began walking to the Castle when she felt something squash against her foot. She raised her foot to see the remains of a cow.
"You really should look where you walk." Saria said. "Oh no! I wonder if I squished anything else..."

Zelda said, nervously. "Did you feel anything else splat against your foot?" Saria asked. "No..." Zelda said. "Then you probably didn't step on anyone else." Saria said. "I guess." Zelda said. They began walking towards the Castle again, Zelda looking wherever she stepped.

Near the Forest...
Link's hand twitched and he became concious again. "Ugh..." he said.
1112122121.title: Look Where you Step

choices: The soldiers think Zelda is a monster
11121221211.content:
When Zelda arrived at the castle she saw that the main draw bridge was too small for her too go through. "How am I going to get in the castle? I'm too big too get in without destroying anything." Zelda said as she turned toward Saria who was thinking about how the could help.

"Put me on the ground first." Saria said. Zelda picked up Saria and placed her on the ground. Saria looked at the draw bridge then she looked at Zelda. "Maybe you could squeeze through the drawbridge hole?" Saria asked.

Zelda got on her knees and started to crawl through the hole. She was doing good the first half of the way through. But soon after her hand slipped which caused her knees to break the drawbridge. When she got back up she broke the gate by accident.

"Oops! I didn't mean to break that it." Zelda said. "At least you tried not to break it."Saria said. Zelda then picked Saria up and placed her back on her shoulder. Zelda saw then that....
11121221211.title: Big Welcome

choices: The captain knows where Link is
He doesn't have a feakin clue
111212212111.content:
Zelda stood still for a moment as she noticed that the normally busy market place was empty.

"Um, is it always this quiet?" asked Saria kindly. "No, never...not seen Ganondorf's hellish reign..." suddenly Zelda began to fear the worse.

But lucky for her one by one the villagers began to exit their homes. Apparently they were scared by Zelda' quaking steps they locked themselves inside their homes.

Finally the guards made their way to the giant princess. "Oh Princess, you seem to have grown on her trip." said one of the guards with a laugh. Zelda blushed but laughed as well.

"Yes I have, by the way sir have you seen Link. My friend and I are looking for him."

The Guard captain then stood forward. "Link...hmm...let me think for a moment..."

Both Zelda and Saria waited with hopeful eyes as they wondered if they had finally found a clue to Link's location.
111212212111.title: Just a precaution

112.content:
Malon awoke early like she does everyday. The ranch was pretty quiet like it was every morning. Her father and Ingo had left on a two day vacation which left her with lots to do. She began doing task such as grooming the horses,checking the cuccos for eggs and so on.

Until her final task was to milk the cows which wasn't her favorite thing to do. When she went to the barn she saw a note attached to the barn door. She took the note off the door and read it. Dear Malon
"I left you a surprise for you in the barn! Love Talon."

Malon went into the barn to find a giant cow that was at least 3 times as big as a normal cow. She gasped in awe as cow let out a loud "Moo" sound. She started to milk it which was hard because it's udders were so big.

But after she was done she had to bottle all of that milk which took up until lunch. She was so tired she could think but nothing sleeping. She sat on a crate and rested for a minute. She recalled she had to deliver the milk. She was about to leave the ranch when she saw a extra bottle of the new cow's milk.

She was thirsty so she drank the entire bottle. She felt so calm and relaxed after that drink she drifted into a deep sleep.
112.title: Milkin Malon

1121.content:
Malon woke up her sleep was very peaceful. As she yawned she opened her eyes she looked at her surroundings they seemed the same only a little bit smaller. Malon got up off the ground and saw that the farm house and the barn were as barely as big as her waist.

At first Malon was a little shocked she thought she had maybe been transformed into a giant monster. She looked at her limbs and her clothes. She saw that they were still the same. Malon was relived her theory was not real. She was curious about her environment even though she was still a little frightened about what happened to her.

She approached the barn and gently lifted the roof off the barn. She peeked inside the barn and saw all the horses and cows. They looked like little mice. She had come to the conclusion that she must have been enlarged in some way.

"The milk of that new cow might have something to do with it." Malon thought to herself "Milk!" Malon said loudly she remembered that she needed to deliver the Milk to the Castle it was especially important considering it was Princess Zelda's birthday tomorrow. Malon got down on her knees a franticly searched for the crate of milk only to find....
1121.title: Massive Malon

11211.content:
Malon looked to discover the remains of the crate it must have been crushed by one of her earlier actions she thought of how to fix the problem. She went back to the barn and reached in and pulled out a cow. She thought about milking another cow but unfortunately her hands and fingers were much to large to milk it or pick up any of the bottles.

Malon sighed she failed there is noting she could do but go to the castle and try to explain how she messed up the order. Malon left the ranch completely forgetting she was a giantess. She was so worried about the delivery she started to space out. In a few seconds she was near the drawbridge.

Still spaced out she walked right through the drawbridge reducing it to rubble. The people in the market ran for their lives. Malon destroyed the fountain in the center square as well as damaging so of the buildings on her through the market.

The gate near the castle was soon destroyed in cause of the wayward giantess. The castle guards could do nothing but gasped in awe as she made her way to the castle which was still taller than her but she could still easily destroy.

Malon recovered her train of thought. Surprised by how fast she got there she looked back and saw all the damage and blushed at the fact that she got to the castle so fast and that she caused so much damage in such a short time.

She bit her lip as he examined the castle's main drawbridge it was up which covered up the main door. She proceeded to knock on the drawbridge but she knocked a little to hard and broke it. A soldier emerged from the door.

"W-What business so you have here?" The soldier asked. "I need to see Princess Zelda." Malon told him normally he would've told her to buzz off but given the fact that the girl was bigger than his house he just agreed.

"Y-Yes well just stay right here."
11211.title: A little walk to Hyrule Castle.

112111.content:
Malon waited outside quietly as the soldier went to get the Princess. She sat down next to the castle looking down at the river she took off her boots and dipped her feet in the water. The water only reached her ankles but it felt very relaxing. She waited for almost an hour before the soldier came back.

"The Princess will be here in a moment" The soldier said as he left. Malon continue to wait until Princess Zelda finally emerged from the castle. She looked at the damages do to her kingdom then she looked at the giant girl sitting out in front of the castle.

"Why have you come here and destroyed my Kingdom you giant freak?" Zelda said in an irritated tone. Malon picked Zelda up with two fingers and held her in front of her face.

"Actually I'm from Lon Lon ranch and I was wondering if you would be mad if something happened to your shipment of milk?" Malon asked trying to keep a straight face. Zelda's attitude was really staring to annoy her.

"What happened to it? They need that milk to make my birthday cake?" Zelda yelled Malon started to frown.

"I tried to replace the milk but I couldn't." Malon said.
112111.title: Malon and the princess.

1121111.content:
Zelda was in no mood to hear excuses she began to start yelling at Malon. Of course Malon was not even paying attention. She set the Princess back on the ground. Zelda mean while was still complaining about how Malon ruined her birthday.

Malon who was still not listening to a word Zelda said she began to put her boots back on and get up off the ground. She got back up on her feet turning toward Zelda who was now done yelling.

"I'm leaving." Malon told Zelda as she started to walk off.

"I command you to pay me at once!" Zelda said while her face was turning pink.

"No way!" Malon said smiling with her big pink tongue sticking out as she started to walk away. Zelda's expression changed from ticked off to extremely angry.

"Guards!" Zelda yelled furiously.

Hundreds of Castle guards came running out of the castle and surrounded Malon. Each of them came spear and shield equipped even though none of them were even a minor threat. Malon just smiled as she said "Boo!"

Almost all of the guards ran away from her. Malon just giggled at the fact that they were so scared of her. She never had this much fun at the ranch. Being so big she didn't have to listen to anyone or follow any rules. She looked at Princess Zelda who was now frightened of her.

Malon reached toward Zelda and picked her up still smiling as she thought of what she could do with the Princess in her hand.
1121111.title: Malon listens to no one.

choices: Hyrule, bow down to Princess Malon!
11211112.content:
Malon smiled and looked at Zelda.

"I want to be the princess." Zelda gave her a wierd look.

"You can't be the princess!" Zelda said angerly.

"Why not?"Malon said in her defence.

"I'm the princess!" Malon took off her boot and layed Zelda on the ground, then hovered her foot over her.

"Now can I be the princess?" Malon asked nicely.

"No!" Zelda yelled. Malon lowered her foot onto Zelda, but didn't press down.

"Now can I?" Malon again asked nicely.

"Never!" Malon pressed her foot down.

"Now can I be the princess?"Malon said angerly.

"N...n-no!" Zelda said

Malon slid her foot backwards, then forwards, causing Zelda to be scooped up by her foot.

"Well, then, I'll just have to get rid of you." Malon said as she put her boot back on.
11211112.title: The New Princess

112111121.content:
Malon had now realized she could do anything she wanted. She smiled as she felt Princess Zelda squirming around on her toes. Meanwhile inside the boot Zelda was having a horrible time. She was caught between Malon's toes which grew tight each time she took a step.

Also her feet gave off a strong odor which was causing Zelda to gag. Plus since Malon just took her feet out of the moat her toes were cover in a slimy layer of sweat. Malon now in control of Hyrule.

She already had completely taken over the castle in a matter of minutes. She set out to rightfully announce her reign as Princess. Before she left she commanded everyone to bow in her presence. The entire market went on their hands and knees bowing Princess Malon.

She also commanded that the damages that she made to the town were to be repaired by the time she came back. Also the entrance to the castle town was to be modified so she could enter without destroying the town an further.

The people all nodded in agreement. Malon left the town after giving out here orders. While walking through Hyrule field Malon didn't feel any movement from Zelda who was still in her boot. She sat down and pulled her boot off and picked up Zelda.

She most likely passed out due to the lack of air. She put her boot back on and stood up again.

"I wonder where I should go next?" Malon pondered with Zelda still in hand.
112111121.title: Princess Malon Livin Large

1121111212.content:
Malon thought about going to the Kokori forest to start her reign. Still holding Zelda in her hand she stomped her way across the field crushing trees,rocks, and any fences in her way. A journey that would have taken hours was done in a few mere minutes.

When Malon approached the forest entrance she saw a few large trees blocking the entrance. She didn't even need both her hands in order to lift them out of her way. She then entered the forest her waist brushed against the large trees. At first she had to search for the hidden town.

She finally spotted it in the exact center of the forest. As she approached it her booming steps caused trees to fall down. The children began to run in their houses afraid of the earthquakes and falling trees.

Only a few of the braver ones stood outside to see what was causing all of the chaos. When Malon's titanic figure came into view the children that were not hiding all gathered up in the center of the village.

Malon now in the village stepped on many different houses. It was hard for the kids to tell whether she was stomping the houses on purpose or accident. When she stood in front of the crowd she decided it was time to establish who was in charge.

"Hey I'm here to tel-" Malon said before she was interrupted by their screams of fear.

"Hey are you listening too me?" the children began run away from her in fear. Apparently she was unable to properly communicate with them.

She needed someone their size to talk to them. She could get Zelda to do it but she was still asleep in her hand. So Malon was face with the choice too.....
1121111212.title: Malon's visit to the Korkori forest.

11211112121.content:
Malon knelt down to her knees and carefully picked one of the children up in her hands. Malon now held the tiny korkori child in her hand. She was a green haired girl in green clothes.

"Why have you come here?" the girl asked Malon.

"I've come to take over as Princess of Hyrule. What is your name little girl?" Malon asked her.

"Saria is my name." Saria answered.

"Well Saria I've come here to make sure your all loyal to me. I need you to talk to them tell them if they pledge their allegiance to me." Malon said.

"And if I refuse?" Saria asked the giantess. Malon lifted her big boot and purposely crushed a house that was incidentally Saria's own house.

"I see." Saria said watching her own house being crused into debris.

So Malon lowered Saria to the ground there Saria explained to the other children Malon's conditions they all agreed to the terms. Saria then signaled for Malon to pick her back up.

"They agree Princess Malon." Saria said.

"All right. I want all you to carve that tree into a suitble throne." Malon ordered the kids as she pointed to Great Deku Tree. Malon then left the forest thinking of where to go next.
11211112121.title: Malon's  trip to the forest.

choices: Continue to head to Lake Hylia.
112111121212.content:
Malon rushed off leaving the forest inhabitants of rebuild their homes as well as fulfill Malon's demand. When she reached Hyrule field she headed south toward Lake Hylia. While walking she heard a someone yelling below she scanned the ground. She saw Link on the ground staring up at her.

"Howdy down there fairy boy." Malon said with a smirk.

"Malon? What on earth happened you?" Link said with a surprised look on his face.

"Something wonderful. Now what do you want?" Malon said sternly.

"I heard that you kidnapped Zelda I've come to stop you?" Link said. Malon lifted her foot and slammed it down in front of him. Link fell to the ground. Malon bent down hovering her humongous face in front of Link.

"Yeah I did it. What are you going to do about it?" Malon said smiling. Link got back on his feet drawing his sword in the process. Malon grabbed it off him and examined it for a second before tossing it off into the distance.

"Aww lost your sword did you? Don't worry you'll be seeing it real soon." Malon said giggling maniacally. She grabbed Link and tossed him in the same direction as the sword.

"Bye-Bye fairy boy!" She said as Link disappeared into the distance.
112111121212.title: Link the obstacle? NOT!

1121111212121.content:
Malon continue on toward Lake Hylia. Her presence was know to more than half of the kingdom. She had just reached the entrance to the lake. She was tall enough to see it's clear waters from here. The Lake that used to be so deep could only come up to her neck. She sat down near the shallow edge of the lake.

"Maybe I should go for a swim." Malon said taking off her boots. She didn't have a bathing suit not to mention one her size. So she hopped into the lake relaxing. The water was warm sort of like a hot tub.

When she finished she sat at the edge of the lake putting her boots back. After decided to finish her mission to conquer Hyrule.
1121111212121.title: Some relaxation

choices: She is attacked by some Gorons.
She sees Link in the Volcano.
11211112121211.content:
Malon continued to Death Mountain. Approaching the Kakariko Village she quickly crushed the gate at the entrance. She spotted the Soldier at the entrance of the village. She gave him a wink but he quickly went running away.

She passed through the village accidentally crushing a few empty houses. Most of the people did not run away scared by this time word of Malon's presence in hyrule had already been heard by nearly everyone.

She began to climb the mountain. Even as large as she was at her size it was still a massive mountain. When she reached the top of the mountain.
11211112121211.title: Death Hill err Mountain.

choices: Malon accedentally causes a lava leak.
112111121212111.content:
Malon while climbing the mountain noticed several gorons rolling down death mountain in an attack like pattern. Gorons seemed to be lined up by size. The smaller ones didn't seem to faze her she just swat at them too knock them sideways.

"Nice try insects." Malon said. The larger Gorons however actually hit her with enough force to knock her off her feet. When Malon fell to her feet her body knocked a boulder off the mountain that started rolling toward the Kakariko village.

The boulder smashed through the gate and was headed straight toward the houses and destroyed them on impact. Malon got up off the ground anger was in her eyes as she kicked the gorons into the volcano. Malon was very angery and quickly began pounding on the mountain.
112111121212111.title: Goron attack.

1121111212121112.content:
Malon then noticed a small lava leak in the volcano. She rolled a boulder she saw by the lava leak.
"That takes care of that." Malon said as she smiled. "I better check on Zelda." Malon removerd her boot. She picked up Zelda in her hand. Zelda slowly awoke.

"AH! Let me go!" Zelda yelled.

"Can I be Princess of Hyrule?" Malon softly asked.

"NO YOU CAN NEVER BE PRINCESS!" Zelda sneered. Malon shrugged. She started to put Zelda back in her boot.
"Don't you dare put me in that boot! Your feet are so smelly!" Zelda cried.

"Can I be Princess...."

"NO!!!" Zelda interrupted. Malon put Zelda in her boot. She slowly put her bare foot in the boot. Zelda rolled and moved around trying to avoid Malon's feet. All of a sudden Malon's foot turned very quick. Zelda got flung back. When she looked up she was stuck in between Malon's toes. Malon started to head to Kakariko village. When she looked down she saw Link.

"Malon you have to stop! Give me Zelda!" Link yelled.

"That's no way to act in front of the ruler of Hyrule." Malon said as she laughed.

"You don't rule Hyrule yet! I can still stop you!"Thinking for a moment Malon.....
1121111212121112.title: Malon's encounters Link yet again

11211112121211121.content:
Malon reaches down and picks up the tiny Link in front of her.
"Wow Look how tiny you are!" Malon laughed.
"Let me go! NOW!" Link yelled.
"You know what. I think I am going to carry you around" Malon thouhgt. Link's eye's gre wider.
"Now where can I put you....I guess I'll put you in the other boot for now.: Malon shrugged. Malon reached down for her other boot and took it off reveling her bare foot. Malon dropped Link in her boot.
"WHAT ARE YOU DOING!!!" Link spazed. Malon slowly slide her bare foot in the boot. She could feel Link squriming around in her boot trying to avoid her foot.
"Now onward to Kakariko village." Malon said as she walked down death mountain. "I am so close to conquering Hyrule!" Malon laughed.
11211112121211121.title: One step closer

choices: Cut Malon's foot with the Master Sword.
Blow his way out with the Bombs.
112111121212111211.content:
Malon quickly ran towards the village. Inside both her boots were princess Zelda and Link the hero of time. Both of them were having a horrible time. Mainly due to the fact that Malon's feet had a terrible smell, and her toes constantly squeezed them both.

Zelda didn't have many options for escape. Link on the other hand could probably cut Malon's foot with his sword or blow his way out with a bomb either one was dangerous however. Malon already entered the village.

She stood in front of the windmill. Curiously she began to twirl her finger around spinning the windmill with it. Faster and faster she spun it soon the windmill was moving like the blades of a fan.

"This is fun." Malon said excited. However the nearby well was directly linked to the windmill soon water started to leak out the well until the whole village began to flood. Of course this different effect Malon considering the water only reached her ankles. But to the villagers it was life threatening.

Link started to gasp as Malon's boot started to fill up with water. He knew that Zelda was in trouble as well as himself. He thought of hiw he could escape and decided to...
112111121212111211.title: Malon's Revisit to Kakariko.

1121111212121112111.content:
Inside Malon's boot....
Link pulled out his sword. He quickly sliced Malon's foot. A trickle of blood started to run down her foot. Link slashed her foot again. This time he got her attention. Malon reached down and took of the boot with Link in it. She picked Link up and held him in the palm of his hand. Malon then noticed some blood coming form her foot.

"What's wrong fairy boy?" Malon glared. "You don't like my feet so you decied to cut them?" Link quickly slahed Malon's hand with his sword. Malon quickly pulled her hand back. Link fell to the ground. Luckily the water broke Link's fall. Link started to swim away. Malon scooped up Link again with her hand.

"I'll see you later." Malon tossed Link towards Zora fountian.

"Well it looks like I conqured this place." Malon laughed. "I'm really hungry, I think I'm in the mood for fish....Next stop! Zora's fountain!" Malon put her boot back on and headed to Zora's fountain.
1121111212121112111.title: Link's great escpae

choices: Malon reaches down and grabs Link.
11211112121211121111.content:
Link landed right in front of Zora's fountain.
"I have to warn the Zoras about Malon!" Link said as headed to see King Zora.

"KING ZORA!!!" Link yelled. Link arrived in front of King Zora.

"Yes Link, how can I help you?" The king of Zoras kindly asked

"Listen Malon is giant! She may be coming this way! We have to warn the other zor...." At that second Link was interrupted by loud nosie. All of a sudden the top of Zora's fountain was missing. So you could see right into it. Link then saw Malon's giant face peering into the fountain.

"MMMM! Fish my favorite!" Malon laughed. Malon grabbed a Zora she saw swmming away. Malon threw it up in the air and caught it in her mouth. She swallowed it. That's when Malon noticed King Zora and Link.

"Wow that's a big fish!" Malon said. Malon reached down and picked up King Zora.

"Link you have to save the rest of the Zoras!" King Zora shouted. When Link looked back at King Zora he was gone. Malon jaw was going up and down chewing on King Zora.

"Malon that's it! I have to stop you!" Link roared.
11211112121211121111.title: Link and the Zoras

choices: Malon tries to step on Link.
Malon tries to put Link back in her boot.
112111121212111211112.content:
Malon reached her hand down and grabbed Link.
"Hmm? I wonder what you would taste like?" Malon thought.
"NO! You can't eat me!" Link spazed.
"Watch me!" Malon laughed. Malon set Link in her mouth. She closed her mouth.

Link was standing inside malon's mouth. It was so amp and cool.
"I have to do something before I get swallowed!" Link ran around her mouth and started slashing everything he could with his sword. He then saw Malon's mouth opening up. Link knew this was his chance. he quickly darted out of her mouth. He flew to the ground. He rolled to help break the fall.
"Come on Link! Your ruining all the fun! I am so close to ruling Hyrule!" Malon glared.
"Well your going to have to get by me!" Link pulled out his sword.

Malon thought.....What should I do.......
112111121212111211112.title: Hyrule is almost conqured.

choices: Zelda wakes up to see she is free from Malon.
Malon goes to her next destination.
1121111212121112111121.content:
Malon lifted her foot aiming at Link she slammed it down hard. Fortunately for Link Malon's foot missed his body. Link quickly used his sword to cut open a hole in the Malon's boot.

He skill fully jumped inside and grabbed Zelda. Before he could get out Malon's toes tripped him causing Zelda fo go flying out of the hole. Malon took off her boot and emptied out Link into her hand.

"You're not going to bother me anymore." Malon said she bawled her fist with Link still in it and began to go elsewhere. Leaving Zelda unconscious on the ground in the Zora's domain.
1121111212121112111121.title: Zelda's Escape.

11211112121211121111212.content:
With Link in her hand she set out for the Gerudo Valley. On the way there she saw an army of guards blocking the way.

"Halt!" One of the guards ordered.

"Yeah right please. I'm am so close to taking control Hyrule! Now get our of my way." Malon said as she stepped on all of the guards. Malon entered Gerudo Valley. She saw one of the Gerudos standing watch. Malon snatched her up in her free hand.

"Tell all the Gerudo's to worship me or I will crush all of your homes!" Malon commaded. The Gerudo nodded. Malon let the Gerudo down. She ran off. A few minutes later she arrived back.

"We will all follow any of your commands. We all agree." The Gerudo said.

"Good." Malon said. "Hyrule is mine!" Malon laughed. Malon felt Link struggling in her hand. Malon left the Gerudo's and headed back to Hyrule.

When Malon got up to the Hyrule bridge she saw....
11211112121211121111212.title: Malon in charge

choices: Zelda was about half Malon's size.
112111121212111211112122.content:
Zelda stood on the drawbridge almost as if she was waiting for someone. Approaching the castle her Malon decided to see what she was up too.

"What are you doing here at my castle?" Malon asked surprised Zelda didn't run away.

"What do you mean your castle. Put Link and Leave my castle at once." Zelda sneered at her. Malon was shocked that not only Zelda defied her but also that she refused to believe Malon was greater than her.

"Are you crazy? I don't have to listen to you." Malon said reaching down for Zelda. Before she could grab her a bolt of lightning struck Malon's hand.

"I've found a way to stop you." Zelda said as her body started to glow orange. Soon Zelda started to grow larger. Malon was scared stiff. "What if Zelda grows bigger than me." she thought to herself. When the light started to die down Malon could see that...
112111121212111211112122.title: Secret Weapon

choices: Zelda agrees and becomes Malon's assistant.
Zelda her spell again and grows larger than Malon.
1121111212121112111121221.content:
Zelda opened her eyes expecting to be at eyelevel with Malon. She was shocked to find out she was about half as tall as Malon. Malon face changed from threatened to confident.

"Ha your still small compared to me you pipsqueak! Your not even taller than the castle walls." Malon said laughing in her face. Zelda became angry and tried to attack Malon. Unfortunately she couldn't even hurt her in anyway. It was like Zelda was a little sister trying best an bigger, older, smarter sister.

"I can't even damage her." Zelda thought to herself. Malon finally started to take matters in her own hands. She knocked Zelda to the ground and sat on her back pinning her to the ground. Malon completely bested her while still holding Link in her hand.

"You should really give up now. If you give up, pledge your loyalty to me, and proclaim me as Princess of Hyrule I might not eliminate you." Malon said trying to strike a deal!
1121111212121112111121221.title: Zelda's defeat.

choices: Zelda is still good and lets Link go.
11211112121211121111212211.content:
Zelda knew she was beat she couldn't best Malon. After all Malon was more likely to rule Hyrule by now. Being second in command wouldn't be so bad after all she was that spell made her half as tall as Malon and Malon was huge.

"Alright you win I shall follow your every command" Zelda said. Malon trusted her words she got up off Zelda and let get up off the ground.

"Very good you shall be my asstant." Malon said. "You shall follow me and do as you're commanded." Malon ordered.

"Yes your Highness." Zelda said obediently. Malon was finally in control of the whole kingdom. She dropped Link out of her hand and gave him to Zelda.

"I want you to get rid of Link. I trust you can can do this with out my help?" Malon asked. Zelda nodded. Malon walked away leaving the giant Princess with Link in her hand. The question is is Zelda still good or has she truly Malon's slave?
11211112121211121111212211.title: Malon's assistant.

choices: When Zelda turns around Link cut himself free and run's off.
Zelda walks up to the tree ready to step on it.
112111121212111211112122112.content:
Zelda carries Link over to a tree.
"I'm sorry I have to do this Link." Zelda grabbed some ropes and tied Link to the tree.
"Link I'm sorry I have to kill you. But I may be the only one who can save Hyrule now. I'm going to kill you as fast as I can, so I am going to just step on the tree." Zelda turned around. Not facing Link. "I'm sorry Link"
112111121212111211112122112.title: Zelda turns?

choices: Zelda cracks and tells Malon the truth.
1121111212121112111121221121.content:
As Zelda turns she is conflicted. Link had already cut himself free and began to run away. Zelda now was chasing after him. But of course she wasn't running that fast she could. She wanted him to get away. Eventually he called Epona and made his getaway.

"Good luck Link." Zelda said. Zelda could see malon coming back her way. As Malon approached Zelda bent her head down.

Did you destroy Link like I told you to?" Malon asked her servant. Zelda tried not to let Malon see her face.
1121111212121112111121221121.title: Zelda's betrayal.

11211112121211121111212211211.content:
"Yes Malon, Yes I did. Link is gone." Zelda hung her head.
"Well dood. Now with Link out of the way I can conquer Hyrule!" Malon laughed. Zelda looked up in the sky and hoped Link got somewhere safe.


Meanwhile.....

Link was riding on Epona. He stopped.
"What can I do!" Link thought. "I need to stop Malon! But how can I!" Link jumped back on Epona and rode off.
11211112121211121111212211211.title: Dilema

112111121212111211112122112111.content:
Link stoped to think for a moment. If Malon had used milk at the ranch, then maybe he could use it to! He he whiped Epona in the direction of the ranch.
When he arrived at the ranch, he headed straght for the barn. Link ran into the barn and spotted the giant cow. He walked in the direction of the cow, but triped and fell. Looking to see what tripped him, he spoted a timy com, at least a third the size of a normal cow.

"You've got to be joking." Link muttered. He put 2 and 2 together and figured out what was going on. He looked from the large cow to the little cow and thought of what to do.
112111121212111211112122112111.title: You SO Saw This Coming

choices: The milk had no effect on Link, and he reaches Zelda.
1121111212121112111121221121111.content: Link thought it over, and decided to go for the big cow. He milked the cow and took a deep breath before drinking it. "This better work....!" He chugged the milk and to his suprise... nothing happened. "Hm, maybe I should try the little cow then..." Link milked the smaller cow and chugged its milk. Again, nothing happened. "What the..." He walked out of the barn and looked around outside, and saw Zelda in the distance. Malon was not in sight. He hopped onto Epona and rode over to her, he knew she wasn't actually trying to kill him, and she let him go. He'd be fine, Link thought.
1121111212121112111121221121111.title: Choices...

choices: Zelda uses the milk to grow and fight Malon.
Zelda want's to use the milk to shrink Malon back to normal.
11211112121211121111212211211111.content:
As the speeding horse approached the giant princess Link could feel the reigns get heavier and heavier. By the time he reached her he was almost half of his normal size but he was in too much of a hurry to noticed.

Zelda could see the horse below her. She recognized the horse as Link's and used and canceled the spell causing her to shrink back to normal size. Link jumped off his horse and approached Zelda. He gasped as he noticed that Zelda was normal size yet her waist was at his eye-level.

"Link what happened to you?" Zelda asked noticing the hero was still dwindling in front of her.before long Zelda had to pick him up just to talk to him.

"Zelda I think on of Malon's cow caused her to grow so large." Link stated. He thought that if the cows milk shrunk him mabye it worked in reverse.

"Show me these cows." Zelda asked him as she hopped on Epona. when Zelda entered the barn Link explained how he drank to milk and such. Zelda was thinking of a way to use this to her advantage.
11211112121211121111212211211111.title: The Little Hero

choices: She heads towards Lon Lon Ranch.
112111121212111211112122112111111.content:
Zelda was deep in thought trying to figure out what to do when it hit her. She could not only be as tall as Molan she could be way taller. The princess closed her beautiful eyes and started to chant her growth spell. Opening her eyes she looks down upon Link and says, "Link milk the cow's milk into the trough, so I can grow bigger than Malon."

Link starting to put two and two together complies. When all of this was done Zelda puts her lips to the trough and drinks every single drop in the trough. Instantly she starts to grow to over a thousand feet tall. All in Hyrule saw hope as their Princess grew and grew to a beautiful behemoth.

Meanwhile Malon also sees Zelda growing over four times her size and starts to worry about how she will keep Hyrule under her control. She finally decides on a plan.
112111121212111211112122112111111.title: Spells and Milk

choices: Malon steps on link and destroys the castle
Malon try's to use link as leveridge again y
1121111212121112111121221121111111.content: Malon was angry and she head straight towards lon lon ranch. Meanwhile zelda was now six times the size of malon. Malon picks up link and says "no more if you want link to live you better go. Zelda walks up to malon and kicks her far so far she lands just in front of hyrule. Link was unconscious In Malone hand and malon got up and she
1121111212121112111121221121111111.title: She heads towards Lon Lon Ranch.

113.content:
One fine day, Saria was making her back home from within the Lost Woods, for she had been playing her ocarina in her usual place.

As she skipped along a skull kid appeared out of nowhere, as they usually do, and walked up to Saria.

"Oh hello Ms. Saria, I was hoping to run into you for I found something that appears of value in the woods." said the small creature.

"...Of Value? Well then can I see?" asked Saria kindly. "Of course." answered the skull kid who then preceded to open his hand and showed Saria a beautiful golden necklace with a greenish orb on it.

"Wow, its so pretty." squealed Saria. "If you want you can have it, Ms. Saria." "Really thank you so much." responded Saria.

The Skull Kid nodded and placed the necklace around Saria's small and slim neck. He then disappeared in a puff of smoke.

"It really is beautiful..." whispered Saria to herself.

Suddenly Saria felt a twitch of pain within her body and caused her to gasp for second. Fortunately for her as soon it came was as fast as it left her body. Ignoring it for now she then decided to continue on her way.

'What was that all about?' wondered Saria...
113.title: A special necklace

choices: Saria is spots someone on a horse in the distance.
1131.content:
Saria's necklace starts to grow brightly. It glows to bright for her to see, her vision is soon engulfed in light. The light feels a little warm and peaceful soon after Saria's view comes back to her. The normally leaf filled forest was clear and blue.

"What?" was the only word she could say. She could see all kinds of things she never seen. Unknown to her she had at least grown roughly 5 times her normal size. The forest that she once was her home to her now couldn't reach higher than her waist.

"I wonder whatdid this to me?" Saria asked herself as she began leaving the forest. The Hyrule field wasn't very lagre to her but she could see several structures in the distance.
1131.title: Giant Saria.

choices: She eventually sees the Young Link that is below her.
Saria wants to visit Hyrule Castle.
11311.content:
Now that Saria was about 35 feet tall, she strolled out of the woods and onto Hyrule Field. "Won't I die if I leave the forest?" Saria thought to herself again. She put her first step onto the field and nothing happened. The necklace must've given her a special immunity to the world around her. "Cool! If Link can leave the Kokiri Forest, then so can I!"

Saria happily skipped through the vast Hyrule field, unaware of what was below her or what dangers may lie ahead.
11311.title: It was Destiny to Leave the Forest...

choices: Saria wants to stay in town to try to make friends.
Saria would rather meet the famous Princess Zelda in Hyrule Castle.
113112.content:
Saria saw the castle that was only, to her, about 5 feet away. She looked at the drawbridge, noticing that she was barely below the gate ceiling above her. While walking, she noticed that the buildings went up to her waist. The people were trembling with terror when they saw the giant girl walk through the little town. Saria gave a friendly smile as she looked down at them.

She noticed something else. Something more adorable and soft to the touch. "What a cute looking animal!" Saria was tempted to lift the small brown dog. It fit perfectly in the palm of her hand. She stroked it gently with the tip of her long index finger. "You are a cute animal. Yes you are!" She told it in a playful tone. "What are you animals called? You remind me of the squirrels in the forest."

The guards around the town looked up and talked. One of them said to the gang of three, "Do you think that she's a threat?" The other soldier replied, "I don't think so, considering that she is having fun with that dog. I hope that she doesn't work for Ganondorf." They continued to look up at her, anticipating her next movements.

Saria put the dog down while saying, "Thank you for letting me hold you." The dog seemed pretty happy being with the big Saria, but it ran off to its owner. The fat lady that was the owner of it said, "My baby! I'm so glad that you are alright!" Afterwards, she hugged the dog with considerable gratitude.

"Hmm. The people don't seem to like me very well." Saria thought with a puzzled look on her face.
113112.title: The Little People of Hyrule Market Town

choices: She breaks through the wooden gate of the drawbridge.
She has a better idea and jumps onto the castle.
1131122.content:
Saria wanted to leave the town, in search of something more interesting. Beyond the hills that went to her thighs, she saw the castle in all of its glory. Saria may be tall, but the castle is still twice her size. The jolly green giantess simply walked up the hill and met several soldiers along the way.

One of the small guards said, "Halt! I will not let you harm the princess!" Saria tried to reason with him, "Who said I was going to harm her? I only wanted to visit her. Can I? Please?" The same guard yelled again, "You may not! Leave before you get hurt!" The angry guard threw the spear upwards as if trying to hit Saria's face. Saria just simply slapped it to the side like some skilled martial arts block. The guard gulped, not wanting to pester her anymore. He also bowed down, along with the others taking his lead. "You may go along. And you were also kind enough to say please."

Saria giggled, "Why thank you guys." She felt great about herself when she handled those smaller people without hurting them. The drawbridge to enter the castle was closed shut. "Man this place is highly secured!" Saria thought while thinking of a reasonable solution to enter.
1131122.title: Off to Hyrule Castle

choices: Zelda wants Saria to aid Link in his journey.
Zelda wants to know more about Saria.
11311222.content:
"I know I can do this!" Saria bent her legs slightly, getting ready for her jump. She lunged for the castle and slightly went over the roof. Saria safely landed in Zelda's flower garden. Zelda felt the tremendous vibration from Saria's drop and fell over. "Who? Who's there?" Zelda trembled with a little bit of fear. Despite flattening a few flowers, the rest of the garden was still in good shape. Zelda wanted to scream when she saw the green giant walk towards her, but she managed to keep calm. "Who are you? What did you come here for?"

"I am Saria. I am from the Kokiri forest that is a few miles away from this castle. I only came here to visit you." "How do you know who I am?" Saria kept her voice in a calm tone that made Zelda comfortable, "There is this amazing boy named Link that told me all about you. How beautiful and how wise you are for your age." Zelda smiled and replied, "Now I feel much better, knowing that you are a friend of Link's. I'm glad that Link likes me for who I am."

Saria replied, "Me too. Link may not talk much, but I can tell that he loves pretty girls such as me and you." Zelda looked up at the towering Saria, thinking about what else to say to her.
11311222.title: Hello, your Majesty!

choices: Saria got side tracked and wanted to look at the town.
Saria made her decision and went to Death Mountain to help Link,
113112221.content:
"I want you to help Link on his quest." Those were the words that came out of Zelda's mouth. Saria nodded, while saying, "I'll do whatever I can to help our hero. But, what can I do? Even if I'm this big, I'm not much of a fighter." Zelda replied, "At least give him some encouragement. Do whatever it takes to stop Ganondorf's evil and save Hyrule from further destruction." Saria finally got to her senses and assured Zelda, "I will do it. Question is, where did he go?" "He must've gone to Death Mountain near Kakariko Village, hense the fact that he already obtained the Kokiri Emerald. I sent him on a quest to collect the spiritual stones." "I'll do my best! Farewell Princess Zelda!"

Saria bent her knees as if ready to jump, but was interupted by a Shekiah. "I will teleport you out of here," said Impa. She wasn't even phased by the Kokiri's tremendous height. Saria was warped onto Hyrule field in a heart beat. Impa looked up at her and said, "Protect Link for the sake of Zelda and I!" Before Saria could look at the ninja, she vanished in a puff of smoke. "Ok, might as well fulfill my task." Saria confirmed her mission.

She walked to the hillside with ease and scaled up the stairs, which led to Kakariko Village. Saria was amazed to see another little village inhabited by little people. Saria was tempted to sight-see, but at the same time wanted to help Link on his quest.
113112221.title: A Royal Request

choices: Link says he can figure this out for himself and doesn't need her.
1131122212.content:
"I will never break a promise." Saria said to herself as she quickly walked through the village just to get to the Death Mountain trail. Even at the bottom of the trail, she could see a cavern waiting in front of her. Not only that, but everyone's favorite hero, Link. He looked blurry from a distance, but Saria can notice the color green anywhere.

Link was exhausted, as he sat down and took a rest from navigating the Dodongo's Cavern. Link saw a giant, yet familiar girl walk towards him.
