135222221.content:
It was a normal day in Gerudo village. Urbosa, the queen of the Gerudo, anticipated the visit of Princess Zelda. She was going to look at some trade deals for the village. As she was sitting at her large desk, what seems like a normal bug flew over to her and stung her. It was so small though that she didn't even feel it. However, a few minutes later, she started to feel dizzy and before she could call a guard, she fell unconscious.
Some time later, she awakes to strong rumbling and voices in the distance, belonging to Zelda and one of her guards.
"I'm sorry your highness, we havent seen her all day. We'll go look for her this instance!" The guard says, slightly stressed.
"Alright" Zelda smiles "I'll wait here for when she returns!"
"What...?" Urbosa mumbles "I'm right here.." she gets up, only to realize that her clothes are gone. And she cant see Zelda or the guard anywhere. She is sitting on a strange rock floor, with a giant wooden pillar in front of her. The guard, walks off, right by where Urbosa is. Thats when it hits her...
She's been shrunk to only two inches tall!The giant guard simply walks by, not even noticing her.
Urbosa panics and quickly runs around the pillar, only to see a gigantic Zelda, sitting at the titanic desk. Without any other option, she starts running towards Zelda.

Zelda has been waiting for a few minutes now; while she wasnt that worried. Urbosa wouldn't get hurt or anything. Suddenly, she feels something tugging at her pant leg. "Hm?" She looks down, thinking its a lizard at first, but then...
"U-Urbosa?!" She looks down, seeing her friend now tiny, right next to her. Hesitant, she picks her up and holds her up to her face. "Urbosa? What happened...?"
"I-I don't know Princess! Please, you got to help me!"
Zelda looks at her. At this size, Urbosa looked like a cute little doll. "Hehe, I must say, you do look adorable at this size..."
"Princess! Please!" Urbosa blushed, covering her tiny body up as good as possible.

Zelda looks at her, thinking what to do next...

14111111112221222111.title: Calm Before the Storm

141111111122212221112.content:
Link woke up early hoping to escape while Malon slept. Unfortunately 2 things prevented this. First he was on a crate which at his size looked like the size of a skyscraper. And with his hookshot gone he was stuck.

Even if he had his stuff it wouldn't do much good since Malon was already awake.
"Finally. You're lucky you don't work here full time." She giggled. "At least... not yet." With that Malon reached over for her boots. "I have a lot of chores to do on the ranch and thought you could keep me company. First I'll be milking the cows, then feed the cuckoos, then the horses then...." the list continued as she put the left boot on.

"As for you. I think I'll keep you someplace untill I need you. Like my ........"
141111111122212221112.title: The Littlest Farmhand

choices: Zelda probably wants you back now
1411111111222122211121.content:
Malon hoved link over her remaining boot "hope you like your new temporary home fairy boy!" Malon dropped link into her boot and began inserting her foot. Link raised his head and saw Malons sweaty foot coming inside. Link attempted to get out of the foots way but ended up underneathe Maoons toes. Malons scrunched her toes in joy "hee hee You feel good in there fairy boy. This might just become something permanant" Links face turned pale as she said that.

Malon shouted peppily "well time to get to work." She took a few steps forward and opened the door to outside. Link managed to free himself somewhat just to be stuck in between malons toes for what was dure to be a long sweaty day for her and link. Malon began working by feeding the horses and cows. She combed the horses maines. Stuff like this. At the end of the day Link was covered in Malons foot sweat. "She took him out "woah that day was easier than most huh fairy boy? Now what should we do now...
1411111111222122211121.title: In her boot

14111111112221222111211.content:
"Well, since you seemed to enjoy the last few hours with my beautiful feet, how about you give them both an nice rub." Before Link could protest, both of Malon's massive feet were right in front of him, towering over him like a building wall. She then giggled and began lowering her left foot on him. Link tried to run away from it, but it kept getting closer and closer until her toes were pinning Link on the ground. Rolling the diminutive hero around with her toes for about a minute, she eventually rolled him so he was on his back with his face staring at Malon's big toe hovering inches (to Link) away.
"How about you start with lefty. You already spent the whole day with righty. Lefty need some attention too." Her toe then slowly came closer to his face. "Why don't you start by giving my beautiful toe a nice big kiss." Link resisted, but Malon's toe was going to persuade him one way or another. First it tapped against his face then withdrew, then descended on his face again. This repeated for a few minutes. Link still refused, hoping Malon would eventually grow bored of trying. Unfortunately for him, Malon's toe was getting impatient. After one last tap, i stayed against his face and started to wiggle, rubbing toe sweat all over his face. "How cute. Little Linky's playing hard to get."

Link realized she wasn't going to grow bored of this anytime soon. So, with a sigh he kissed Malon's big toe, holding the kiss for ten seconds hoping that would be enough. "Aww I never knew how much of a romantic you were, Fairy Boy." Malon giggled as she raised her foot and placed it in front of Link. "You can give her a nice rubdown now."
14111111112221222111211.title: Jealous Toes

choices: Malon decides to make the footrub more interesting
141111111122212221112111.content:
Link knew refusing to obey "Lefty's" demands would only make the situation worse than it already was. Malon might not try to hurt him if he refused... at least he hoped she wouldn't try to hurt him. He was, however, aware of the fact that Malon can be a little eccentric and VERY creative. To this day, he still wondered how she managed to get that cow in his tree house. As long as he was completely at her mercy, the smartest thing he could do is do what he is told and hope to stay on her good side.
As he approached her left foot, he struggled not to gag from the smell. Despite being coated in her foot sweat from head to toe thanks to the hours he spent in her boot as well as the prodding from her big toe, Link still couldn't adjust to the stench. Working on a ranch for her whole life must have really added a punch to the odor. As he finally reached the large fleshy mass, Link immediately got to work fearing that any hesitation would lead to more torture or humiliation. He pressed his hands against her massive sole and rubbed as hard as he could. More sweat covered Link as he struggled to work through the taste. "You're doing great, Fairy Boy. That's definitely relaxing after doing all my chores. Maybe after you finish we can play a special game I just thought of." She said with a mischievous grin on her face. Link knew that this game she was thinking of would probably mean some unique form of humiliation for him. Then again, maybe she'll actually give him a break after the date with her feet. Either way, he still had to finish "Lefty's" treatment before he could find out what she had in mind... or would he?
141111111122212221112111.title: The Sweaty Wall's Demands

choices: Malon takes him out durring her chores.

1411111111222122211122.content:
"Special necklace?" Link pondered.
Before he could ask what she ment, Malon reached into a nearby crate and pulled out a long piece of string and proceded to tie it around Link's waist and bind his arms and legs. When she finished securing the knot she admired her work ad Link struggled to move. "There you go, Fairy Boy." Malon said proudly, "You can stay close to me without fearing that you may fall off. I made the knot really tight. Now enjoy the ride."

Malon then put her 'necklace' on resting Link over her clevage. "Let's get to work!" Malon exclained as she stuffed Link under her shirt positioning him between two massive mountains. When she ran out, the mountains shook violently, slamming together sometimes and crushing Link. "This is going to *ow* be a long day *ow*" He muttered as Malons brest continued to pummel him.
1411111111222122211122.title: Malon's new necklace

choices: lets finish up from last night."
14111111112221222111222.content:
Hours went by. Link was constantly being pummeled by Malons gigantic breasts. Then, without warning, light flooded the area he was in and a giant hand pulled the small hero out of the dress.

When Link's eyes finally adjusted to the light he noticed that they were in the secret room again. "Well, you sure look like you had a great time in there." Malon said with a cute giggle. "Now that the chores are done you can start helping me relax a little." Malon giggled as she picked Link up, untied him, and used him to wipe the sweat off her forehead.

"Now..
14111111112221222111222.title: All work and no play

141111111122212221112222.content:
"And I got a game for you." Malon said as she giggled. She then proceded to pick the hero up and after shifting the pile of hay around so that there was a hole in the center, dropping him in this hole, and covering it back up. Light barely made it through and Link could hear Malon's voice muffled by the hay.

"Alright, Link, here's the new game. It's like find the needle in the haystack, only you're the needle and I'm supposed to search with my feet. If you can make it out of that pile before I can find you, you win. But if I can find you and pin you down under my pretty little toes then I win." The sound of hay being moved filled Links ears as Malon made the pile wider. But he couldn't tell due to his point of view. "You can get a 60 second head start, but after that I'm going for ya."

"Ready.....GO!" Malon shouted as she slowly began counting to 60. Link thought he heard more hay being shifted, but didn't pay much attention due to his other problems, The hay was extreamly hard to move in and it made sounds as he moved through it. He'd need to move silently if he wanted to win this.

"58-59-SIXTY! Get ready, Fairy boy!"
141111111122212221112222.title: Find the Need- I mean Link in the Haystack.

1411111111222122211122221.content:
Link moved as fast and quietly as he could. Unfortunately the hay was noisy and slowed him down a lot. Almost instantly after hearing "60" Malon's bare foot came crashing down missing Link by mere inches.

He managed to make it pretty far before the next encounter. The pile seemd to be a lot longer than he remembered. Then the sound giggling could be heard from above. Soon Malon's foot decended a second time, and barely missed him. Link started to panic and run around randomly as Malon toyed with him. Link realized she was toying with him the whole time and could have pinned him any time if she wanted to. And unfortunately, now she wanted to.

Her bare foot went across and knocked him over, then it decended on him until his face was stuck under her toes. "I win fairy boy. Better luck next time."
1411111111222122211122221.title: Malon wins! (what a suprise)

14111111112221222111222211.content:
"So Link, wanna play another round?" Malon asked scrunching her toes together and lifting Link into the air with her foot, "But this time let's raise the stakes."

"What do you mean?" Link questioned in reply.

Malon cleared her throat before explaining "If you win, I'll give you a break tomorrow, but if I win, then I get to use you as my insole for the whole day"

Link thought for a moment as Malon stared intently. On one hand he could wind up beneath Malon's sweaty feet again, on the other hand he would be able to rest tomorrow and possibly formulate an escape plan. On the plus side, he felt he had learned Malon's patterns in the last round. After several seconds of contemplation, Link finally nodded confidently.

Malon giggled in reply and hoisted her foot over the pile of hay, before releasing the tiny hero from her toes. Link plummeted down into the field of gold, landing softly. Far above he heard Malon counting, she was already up to twenty! Link made his way through the haystack,in an easy sprint, he wanted to conserve his energy for any future encounter with Malon's foot.

"Sixty!!!" Malon shouted far above.

The game had begun anew, but who would win in the end?
14111111112221222111222211.title: Round Two, Raising the Stakes

"Hey Zelda Link said he'll forgive if you give us the antidote." Malon told Zelda. Zelda was surprised because Malon had not shunken at all.

"Link are you getting bigger?" Malon asked. Link just stared at her she was the only thing getting smaller.

and Ingo were now sleeping.

14111111222211.title: Sleep in the Barn [EDIT]

choices: Dropped Link out of her pocket
14111111222212.content:
Link and Malon managed to reach the drawbridge to Hyrule Fields, having ran about two miles from their miniature point of view. Malon was ready to fall over by then. "It's going to take days to reach Lon Lon Ranch at this rate!" she panted.

"Yeah, but we have to hurry. Who knows what would happen if—" Link broke off. A huge hand surrounded him and he looked up. "If we were caught...!"

The little girl had recovered from her fall and chased them all the way to the drawbridge. "How did my dollies get all the way over here?" she thought out loud, stuffing the Hero of Time into her pocket. Malon attempted to leap away, but she was also captured in a hand.

"Don't hurt us!" she yelled.

The little girl blinked at the talking doll. "Now it's time to meet my other toys! Your going to love them!" she cheered.

Malon slipped out of her hand and zoomed a few feet away. "I don't wanna meet some dumb stuffed animals!"

"Come back, dolly!" the girl said, skipping after Malon playfully. Unfortunately, she ran too fast, and...
14111111222212.title: Little Playmates

141111112222122.content:
Link felt a sudden jolt and shift in gravity. He found his way out of the pocket and glimpsed at a land far different than the one he was in five seconds ago. The ground was a clear blue, having the reflective trait of a mirror, and he felt the unpleasant taste of what he had eaten for breakfast. "Is this even possible?" he pondered, noting that he could see himself and his captor on the land below.

He took a tight hold of the cloth on the little girl's jacket and climbed to the topmost point of the giant(who was in fact screaming very loud by now).

"Link, your about to hit the water!" Malon yelled down to him.

"What? You mean this is—" he landed on the water, the impact making him lose his breath.
141111112222122.title: Fell into the moat

1411111122221222.content:
Malon sighed as Link struggled to swim onto shore. "Come on, everyone in Hyrule has seen your strange style of swimming. It's actually pretty effective, but there's only one problem. You aren't able to do it now."

"Please help me!" he gasped between going under water and rising up again.

"I know you're as big as a rat, but that's no reason to lose your ability to swim altogether."

"Malon!"

"Maybe if he used an arm on each side of his body, then he might have a chance. Could it be that something has possessed him? Could be, but..." she trailed off. Link was worried that he would drown without another person's presence helping him, or at least noticing him.

"Crap, looks like I'm the only one in this." He said to himself, trying to copy what he learned from being a zora in termina.

"The sky is so blue today... Oh, by the looks of that cloud I think it might rain..." Malon said, now staring upwards away from the drowning Kokiri.
1411111122221222.title: Useless Malon

choices: ...Zelda had entered, with her hands behind her back/
...Impa had heard the blast, and come streaming in.
14111112.content:
Zelda searched the crowds of hyrule market, and was disappointed to find no one of interest. She pushed through the crowded market and walked quickly out the castle gate into Hyrule field. She pondered who could be an acceptable girlfriend for Link, but also someone who she would enjoy tormenting and teasing. She giggled at her own childish thoughts, but an idea came to her. Childish... She remembered Link's upbringing in Kokiri Forest, and recalled that the forest sage, Saria, was known to him.

"Perhaps she will be a cute little girlfriend for him" she thought.

She made her way towards Kokiri forest at quite a pace, anticipating the enjoyment she would get from two shrunken pets.

Meanwhile...

Link was screaming loudly from inside his glass prison. He had tried many times to escape, but his hookshot could not reach anything to latch onto from within the bottle, and he could jump no where near high enough. He realised that his screaming was useless, and sat by his equipment. He knew he had to at least try to escape. He spied his bag of bombs, and placed them at one side of the bottle. He donned his goron tunic, which would at least nulify the heat, and held up his shield.
There was an almighty blast, which threw Link backwards and the flash of light blinded him. His sight slowly returned to him, and he was sitting on a bench. Shards of glass were scattered accross the room, and all of his equipment was either blown to smithereens or lost from sight. He stood up shakily and considered his next move.
As he did however, he heard the sound of footsteps from behind the closed door of Zelda's room. Someone must have heard the blast. Link looked for somewhere to hide, but it was useless. he was on a flat open bench, and the door was opening. As Link turned to run, he saw that...
14111112.title: Searching Elsewhere

choices: She gives them time to chat.
141111121.content:
Link stood there frozen as his fears came came true. Zelda came the room noticing the glass on the floor and was Link next to the broken bottle. She scanned the room for a minute before she finally finds him sitting on the bench in her room.

"You've been a bad boy. You shouldn't be there Link." Zelda said in a motherly-like tone. Link was n't paying attention to her. He was more worried about the fact that Zelda had her hands behind her back.

"What are you hiding back there." Link questioned Zelda. Zelda approached the the bench. Link was still a little uneasy about being so small Zelda looked a hundred feet tall in comparison.

Zelda cupped her hands and lowered them down down to Links level. It wasn't long before she uncupped them. Link gasped in horror as his best friend Saria was sitting in Zelda's hand the same size as him.

"I'll be right back so stay put." Zelda ordered as she got up and went to answer the door. She left Link and Saria sitting on the table as she went to the door.

Link and Saria began looking around the chest to find a way out of there. Then Link notices a string in the chest.

"Saria get to one side of the door and I'll get on the other side" Link instructed "and take the string with you."Saria did what she was told and threw Link the other side of the rope."When I say pull you and me will pull the string causing Zelda to trip then I'll tie the string to her ankles and well get out of here" Link told her the plan. Before they had enough time to decide Zelda manage to untie the rope and go out of her room.

"Quick in the mouse hole"Link said. They manage to get into the hole without being captured by Zelda.

"Aw"Zelda said in sadness. "Too bad there gonna be attacked by the rats, I didn't even have enough time to play dolls with them." Link sighs in relief. Then there was a noise that sounded like a mouse.

"Uh Oh!"said Link. "Saria hide." Suddenly there was a giant mouse twice the size as Link. Link luckily had his sword with him. Link got out his sword and prepared to attack. Saria stood in front of him. Saria used some kind of magic to make the mouse friendly.

"Saria how did you do that?" Link asked.

"Easy I'm a sage of the forest, I can make some animals friendly." Saria explained. She asked the mouse to help them out of the castle. The mouse led the way and showed them the hole out of the castle.

"Thank you."Link said. Then they walked out of the hole and saw the outside of the castle. When they were about three feet away from the hole they heard a deep voice that sounded like Zelda.

"There you are my little toys."she giggled. Then she began to reach at Link and Saria. Saria began to scream. Link got out his sword and was prepared to attack the hand. But the sword wouldn't be enough to stop her hand. Closer and closer the hand got it was almost near their bodies.

Zelda yells at her, "HEY! GIVE HIM BACK! HE'S MINE!!!"

1411111211111111.title: The NEXT Admirer..

Saria ran as fast as she could toward Malon but because of her little run in with the fairies she couldn't even run half as fast as Malon was walking. Just before she was about to give up Malon stopped walking.

Apparently 100 fairies are hard keep bottled up. Malon had to stop to securely seal them in the fish-bowl. During all of this Link could see Saria on the ground running after Malon.

1431.content:
Link was at the lake, fishing. He just recently caught the biggest fish the lake has ever seen. He hears a rustling in the leaves behind and he turns to see what it was. He is hit in the chest and falls over onto his back and passes out. Link opens his eyes to have his vision completely filled by Princess Ruto's face! Link takes a quick look at himself and discovers that he's shrunk to only 2 inches!

"Oh? You’re finally awake!" she quickly takes Link to her cheek and starts rubbing him against it. Link tries to push her away but fails.

"Hold on a sec! What the hell did you do to me?” Ruto finally takes him away from her cheek and looks at him affectionately.

"I shrunk you of course! It was easy with a spell I found in one of my dad's old books. Now we can finally be together!” Link is a little shocked by this.
"Why would you shrink me!?” Ruto looked at him like that was one of the dumbest questions she ever heard.

"You always say you’re too busy to come see me so I decided to make time for you, besides, you really cute at this size, “And now we have all the time we want to enjoy our honeymoon.” Link's jaw nearly drops.

"H-honeymoon!?” Link yelled.

"Yeah, your my husband remember?” Ruto brings Link up to her face and gives him a big, wet kiss on his face, Link's face is completely enveloped in her lips. Link wipes away the aquamarine lipstick from his face, still looking at Ruto with a completely stunned face. Ruto leans back and ponders what to do with her hubby now...
1431.title: Hitched

choices: He makes it in the nick of time.
Ruto is too quick for him
14311.content:
Ruto thought for a moment about what she and link could do now that she had the hero in the palm of her hand. An idea soon came to her as she remembered the water temple which resides at the centre of the lake. She looked down at her miniature husband with a smile, making Link feel uneasy. The sky suddenly darkened for our hero as the Zora princess covered Link with her free hand, trapping him in her grasp. Ruto dove into the water, swiftly swimming to the water temple's entrance. Link was at no risk of drowning, since he had donned his zora tunic for his trip to Lake Hylia, but being jostled around by his wife's fast swimming wasn't exactly fun for him.

Link was finally able to see where he ended up when Ruto removed her hand from above him. Link saw her activating one of the water level mechanisms, the one that filled the water almost to the top. "Ruto, what are we doing here in the temple?" The princess smiled at him. "I wanted to play a game with you, my beloved hero. I thought this would be the perfect place for it." "What kind of game are you talking about?" Link asked, getting a bit worried. "I believe in Hylia, you call it... cat and mouse?" Those three short words made link freeze up. "Or, given the circumstances, I guess 'shark and fish' would be a better fit. And I get to be the shark."Ruto punctuated this by snapping her teeth shut in a biting motion at Link. The startled hero flinched at this motion, which made Ruto giggle.

"Here's the rules. I'll give you a one minute head start to swim away and hide, after that if I don't catch you within, say, five minutes, then you win. If you win, I'll do whatever you ask me to, but if I win, I get to toy with you some more. Time starts now." As she finished speaking, she tilted her hand to the left and dropped Link. He yelled in fear as he fell from what was a great height to him, but only a few feet to his aquatic wife. With a tiny splash, he landed in the water that had now filled the temple. Ruto had turned her back to allow him to hide properly, she wanted the game to be interesting, after all.

The moment Link got his bearings, he started swimming. The water temple had a large pillar in the centre, and he figured that would be the best place to hide. Maybe he could find a crack in the wall big enough for him to hide in but small enough for Ruto to ignore. He searched and searched, finding nothing in the finely crafted temple pillar. A large splashing sound then reached his ears. Oh no. his minute was up, Ruto had jumped in the water. Link was now being hunted by his giant, neglected wife. He swam towards the pillar, hoping he could hug the wall or something to help his chances. Just as he began to swim, he saw a massive dark blue silhouette somewhat far away from him in the semi-opaque water that surrounded him. A chill ran up his spine. It was as if leviathan itself was in the same body of water that he was. But our hero had great courage, so he kept swimming in desperation.

In only a few short moments, the Zora princess had circled the entire pool of water, she passed by Link again, this time, missibg him by only about a foot. She had surely seen Link by now, and she could have easily turned around and grabbed Link, but she kept swimming to make another pass, no doubt wanting to play with him some more. Link couldn't match her sheer speed, the next pass would almost certainly be when Ruto caught him. He needed something to give him an edge. And then he saw it. A hole in the stone wall he didn't see before. It was big enough for him to fit through. If he ould get there i time he kight just have a chance to win. So the question is... does our hero make it?
14311.title: Lake Hylia honeymoon

choices: To go back to normal size.
143111.content:
Link was swimming with as much strength as he could muster. To him, he was going quite fast. But in reality, he was only moving about an inch a second. This speed couldn't hope to match the monstrously fast rate that the giant, aquatic Ruto was swimming at. As the Zora princess rounded the corner, she noticed her tiny husband had almost reached the pillar. He might get away at this rate. Ruto had only been swimming at her equivalent to a walking pace so far, but now that Link was about to win, she kicked herself into high gear. Link noticed Ruto darting towards him, but he did not falter. He kept his eyes on the prize. Link was right next to the wall, but Ruto had almost entirely closed the distance between them. She reached out her hand to grab the tiny Hylian, stretching as far as her arm would allow. But Link vanished through the small hole in the wall. Ruto only grabbed a handful of water, and Link was past an opening that was about the diameter of her little finger. She peered into the room, seeing link swimming away from the hole while keeping his eyes on it. Ruto knew the temple like the back of her hand, so instead of foolishly trying to break the wall down, she swam away to go to the proper entrance.

Link finally had a second to breathe. Ruto had finally gone away, and he now had a second opportunity to hide. He took a look at his surroundings. Like most of the water temple, the area was pretty geometric with not many protrusions. There was a doorway to his right and a flat wall to his left. But above him was an air pocket. There was a platform above the water level. Perhaps he could find a place to hide there. If not, he'd be on dry ground, which his species was more suited for. Unfortunately for him, as soon as he started swimming, Princess Ruto swam through the door with the speed of a torpedo. Smiling as she found her prey. Before Link could react, Ruto's hands entrapped him on either side. He could feel himself being jostled again as Ruto moved with him in tow. Then the water drained out. Ruto opened her hands to reveal she was sitting on the above water platform, smiling. "Well, I caught you Link. But my five minutes were up. So, I guess you win our little game. Nice job, hero." Link was surprised. He wasn't counting, but it didn't feel like it was five whole minutes. Maybe he just lost track of time. "Now, my adorable little hubby, as promised I have to do whatever you tell me to do. I'm completely at your mercy. What are you gonna have me do, hm?" Ruto said this while smiling the sultriest smile she had ever shown. Link then said what he wanted. He wanted...

"Wait, you'll need help finding him, let me help you, to apologize," Illa said, "When it comes to Link, I tend to lose my head." Midna gave a sigh.

"Fine," but you won't like how I travel," Midna said before grabbing Illa and taking her through the portal.

Elsewhere, Link fell into the water and was dragged out to Lake Hylia. As he lay on the docks near where Zora's river lets out, he feels a shadow over him. He opens his eyes and finds
1432111222112211.title: Illa attacks Midna, making her drop Link over t...

14321112221122112.content:
(This chapter was originally written by who-me )

His vision was blurry from his trip, and for a moment thought he was looking into a dark sky when he realized it was the Zora girl who helped on that canoe ride down Zora's river. The Zora girl looked at Link.

"Are you alive?" she asked quietly. Link gave a weak nod. "Good, I didn't want to carry a dead body back up to my boss."

"What?" Link asked.

"It's simple, I plan on taking you there to rest," the Zora girl said picking the tiny Link up. "You're cute, for a human. I might keep you instead." Link was too weak from the rough trip to argue back, no matter how much he wanted to. And so the Zora girl took him back up river.

Elsewhere on Lake Hylia and a few minutes before this kidnapping, Illa and Midna came out of a portal. near the cannon shop.

"What the heck was that?" Illa asked in shock and fear.

"How I travel when not on Link's shadow," Midna said, "Link doesn't mind it at all." Midna then looked around. "Let's check out that dock over where the river let's out.

"All right," Illa said, not liking this imp very much. "Hey, what are you doing?" Illa asked as Midna went into Illa's shadow.

"I may be able to live in the light, but I don't like to when unneeded," Midna said, "Now get going." Illa would of hit Midna again, had she not already been in her shadow. Illa moved quickly towards dock Link was on. A few minutes passed and she saw something go up the small waterfall.

"Hey, what's that?" Illa asked. Midna appeared in her shadow form and looked where Illa was pointing to.

"That's probably the Zora girl who works part-time for a business up stream," Midna said as they got to the dock. When they got there, they found a pool of water where the Zora had sat.

"I don't see anything," Illa said sadly, until her eyes came to something small and green. "What's that?" Illa asked picking it up.

"It looks like Link's hat," Midna said, "But where's Link?" Both girls eyes opened in shock.

"The Zora girl," both said.

"But how do we get up there so we can find him?" Illa asked.

"I know a way," Midna said putting her hands on Illa and enjoyed her yells in dislike as she warped them to Upper Zora's river.

Do they make it in time to save Link?

143211122211221121.content:
(This chapter was originally written by who-me )

In Upper Zora's river, there was a loud scream followed by two consecutive thuds.

"Would you get off my back?" Illa asked Midna as Midna sat on Illa's back, smiling.

"Sure," Midna said floating up, "There's the shop." Midna pointed to it and went into Illa's shadow.

"How does Link deal with her all the time," Illa thought going in.

"Welcome," Iza said to Illa as she entered, "Care for a ride? My assistant should be back soon."

"Uh, thanks," Illa said, "But I'm actually waiting for her. I think she has something of mine.

"Really?" Iza said, "And what would that be?"

"Uhh," Illa said, but was saved an answer when the Zora girl came up to the dock.

"Hey Boss, I found something interesting down in the lake," she said climbing out. She saw Illa. "Is she a customer?"

"No, she says you have something of hers," Iza said.

"What? I've never seen her before," the girl replied.

"She's right, we haven't," Illa said, "But my boyfriend you have."

"Okay, now I'm confused," Iza said.

"My boyfriend was shrunk and accidentally fell into the river. When I got to Lake Hylia, I saw her leaving and his hat where they were," Illa said, holding out Link's hat.

"Is this true?" Iza asked.

"No Boss," the girl said, moving a hand behind her back.

"DON'T! LIE! TO! ME!" Iza yelled.

"All right, I did find a small guy floating in the river," the girl said, revealing Link. Illa was quick to snatch the tiny hero.

"Thanks," she said before rushing out the door. Illa looked at the weary Link. "What do we do now?" she said aloud.

"Simple, go to a Spirit Spring to try and fix him," Midna said appearing, "And I'll take care of that myself."
143211122211221121.title: Yes

choices: She's shocked, but still wants to come.
1432111222112211211.content:
(This chapter was originally written by who-me )

Illa closed her hand and stared Midna in the eyes. "I'm coming with you," she said quietly.

"You can't," Midna replied, "You'll just get in the way."

"I haven't so far," Illa said, "Or I can simply go to one on my own."

"You don't even know where the nearest one is, you stupid girl," Midna said, "Now give me Link."

"No, only if I can come with you," Illa said. Midna shook her head.

"Do you even know what you become when we go through a portal?" Midna asked.

"What do you mean?" Illa asked.

"I mean you become a spirit of yourself, you don't fully exist," Midna said, "Only Link and one other person can enter without issue."

"She's right," Link said, coming around, "Plus, I don't exactly stay like this when we do use portals."

"What do you mean?" Illa asked opening her hand a bit.

"Midna, show her what happens when I enter the twilight," Link said.

"You sure about this?" Midna asked, "This type of secret could end up hurting you in the end."

"I trust her," Link said. Midna sighed.

"All right," she said, taking out the piece of magic and transforming Link into the beast.

How does Illa react?

Illa and Link are interrupted by the sound of girl's laughter, followed by the clip-clop of shoes on the castle bridge. They turn and see Agitha running directly towards them! "There you are, my little bug boy!" Agitha shouts. It is night time, so even though he is tiny Agitha has no problem seeing Link because of his glowing.

"Ooh! And you found a cute little bug girl to take to the dance with you!" Agitha said, looking at Illa with her big cute eyes.

"Now just listen her, you crazy freak" Illa says, getting up in Agitha's face. "Link is a human being; not a bug. You had no right to shrink him like you did. I demand you let him go at once!"

Agitha gave her trademark girlish giggle, "It's such a dangerous world out here for cute little bugs. How about I take you two back to my place where it is safe? We can have a tea party!" Agitha then gave a curtsy with her dress.

Illa decided that girl was completely off her rocker, and she was just going to ignore her and move slowly away from her with Link, but unfortunately Agitha wouldn't allow that to happen. She lifted her hands towards Illa, and the same bug light which had shrunk link came out and struck her too. In a matter of seconds, Illa was reduced to merely 1 inch in height.

Illa let out a high-pitched scream and started running as fast as she could, but all Agitha had to do was walk slowly and she had soon caught up with the tiny girl and snatched her into her hand. "Now I finally have a female human bug, which completes my collection!" she shouted, and then skipped back to her residence in the city - taking Illa and Link with her.

When she reopened her palm, she looked down at her two big eyes and giggled at them.

143331.content:
"Hahaha, how pathetic."
Ganon holds a small cage, just big enough to fit in the palm of hand, but what's inside the cage is what really catches the pig's eye. He stomps down the carpeted hallway of his castle to make his way to the throne room. Once there, he'll probably admire his "treasure" a little bit more then plot his next move.

An unconscious Link sways back and forth unaware of his predicament. The last thing Link remembers was opening a chest in one of Ganon's vile dungeons Instead of getting the usual loot, a black mist poured out and Link was knocked out before he could make a move. A steady flow of warm air splashes on to Link's face, causing the green clad hero to jostle in his slumber.

Link slowly opens his eyes only to find himself surrounded by iron bars. He'd found himself in this situation before,but the way it was swaying made Link uncomfortable.

"Mwahaha, finally awake, are we?"

Link turns quickly to face the source of the sinister voice. The giant face of pig Ganon invaded Link's field of view as Link stood, paralyzed in fear of what he was seeing. Link had fought this form of Ganon before but it was clear he was outmatched. Ganon was humongous. So big that Link could see every hair in his snout, every wart on his face, and every inch of malice in Ganon's stare.

The young hero looked down beyond the bars of his cage and saw that he was many hundreds of feet away from the ground. Ganon took another step down the corridor and Link trembled at the thought of being underneath the massive pig's feet. Link focused his gaze back towards Ganon who was ready to taunt Link mercilessly. This was the moment that he was waiting for his entire long life.

"Are you surprised, Link?", the evil king laughed to himself "This is just a part of the power that I hold. Compared to me, the strength of your puny and pathetic form is that of a mere cockroach."
Link scowled, but he knew Ganon was right. Link wouldn't be able to do anything against the massive pig. Just being near Ganon, and inhaling his powerful odor made Link weak. But he had to do something. Eying the iron bars, Link begins to form an idea.
Ganon continued,"Now that you have been rendered completely useless, I think my next target shall be Princess Zelda. Then, I shall all three triforces and the entire will tremble before me. And there's nothing you can do about it."
Ganon lets out another evil laugh, spewing his rancid breath all over Link. But he ignores it, too eager to put his plan into action.

While Ganon has been giving you his menacing speech, Link has been charging up your signature move:The Spin Attack!
Of course, the hero was smart enough to hide his Master Sword behind his back, as not to let Ganon catch on.
As the flames begin to surround Link's blade, Ganon becomes privy to Link's plan.

"DON'T YOU DARE"

But the call was too late. Link spins around, swinging his sword in a most heroic fashion. The force of the strike combined with the heat of the blade is able to cut through the iron bars of Link's cage. But this isn't the end of the hero's trouble. The floor of the cage falls off and Link plummets to the ground with it. Link can see Ganon's face, full of rage, attempting to snag Link out of the air, with no success.

It's a long way down and Link survive the fall, even if the castle floor is carpeted. His only hope is to grab on to the belt of the massive beast Ganon. But there are many ways for this plan to go wrong, yet Link is known for getting out of sticky situations. If Link isn't able to latch on to the waist of Ganon, then he will fall near the evil king's feet. While Link will survive, being near the pig's nasty feet will not help his situation.

Where did he dissapear to?! When I find him, I'll STOMP HIM INTO PASTE?

1433321.content:
The Gerudo are a warrior race, comprised entirely of dark skinned, red haired amazons. Most of them live in desert strongholds, they have a reputation of thieves and marauders as they often prey on innocent Hylians.

They worship an entity known as the sand goddess, that insures repeoduction for this all female race. They have very little respect for Hylians in general and they have basically no respect whatsoever for men. So in their eyes a Hylian male is basically lower than dirt.

So when an hylian boy clad in green just waltzes on in, stating that he's there to negotiate "peace" on behalf of princess Zelda, the gerudo do the only reasonable thing. That is, shrinking him down and sentencing him to a lifetime of slavery for his insolance.

144111112.content:
"No thank you." Zelda said leaving to look for Link. Sharia hoped that Link would show up soon, but for now get attention was focused on her mini morsel. Link struggled against Saria's fingers but he was too small to make any noticeable struggle against his childhood friend's grip.
         Saria opened her mouth and slowly slipped her tongue out to see if the ingredient was any good. Link stared in shock as his best friend's tongue coated him in a thin layer of saliva. Saria let out a satisfied noise to Link's horror. "Mmm, this is pretty good. I hope Link gets back soon, he's sure to fall for me if even a small part of my food tastes this good!" Link let out an unheard help of fear when Saria popped him in her mouth like a piece of candy.
         Link was sloshed and slid around Saria's mouth as she enjoyed her little treat. Her breath was warm and slightly smelled of roses, likely due to her being the sage of the forest, yet Link didn't have time to appreciate this fact as he fought tooth and nail against the onslaught from Saria's tongue. Saria was delighting in her snack as she licked it all over her mouth. From the roof of her mouth to her palette to imprinting the ingredient in both her cheeks, Saria was loving the taste of what was to come whilst hoping that Link would love it just as much as she did. Then, Saria decided to finish up her taste test and prepare the meal itself for Link's return.
144111112.title: “no thank you” said zelda leaving to look ...

1441111121.content:
Link was exhausted as he struggled against the giant muscle in a warm environment that continuously drenched him in a heavy and sticky liquid. He felt like giving in at this point and Saria seemed all too willing to oblige. Link felt a small suction pull on him as he slid down his best friend's throat alongside her saliva. All around him Link heard a loud GULP as he was pulled down into Saria's gullet, and he heard various noises of her inner workings as he fell. He first heard a constant and soothing THUMP THUMP, THUMP THUMP which was Saria's heartbeat as she felt excited for Link to try her food. Next he heard a distant and echoe-like humm as Saria excitedly prepared for Link. Finally he heard a splash and several gurgling noises all around him as he landed in her stomach. Link was so tired from his fruitless battle that the several noises of Saria soothed into an unending sleep.
         Saria had finally finished preparing dinner and waited a whole hour for Link to show up. Unfortunately, he hasn't returned and Saria was disheartened. "Maybe he had some hero work to do tonight?" Saria pondered as she began he dinner. Her meal helped ease her heartache as she ate it joyfully, yet it wasn't as delicious as the lone ingredient that she sampled an hour earlier. Being the sage of the forest, Saria was immune to the mushroom's shrinking effects. After dinner, Saria had a new resolve to wait for Link another day and see if she could find another one of those tasty ingredients. "Link, I hope you comeback soon and enjoy a meal with me" Saria yearned as she clasped her hands over her stomach, right above Link as he enjoyed his final rest with his best friend's dinner.
1441111121.title: Down the hatch Link goes.

14411112.content:
Saria frowned. having a bug around during dinner time was very annoying. She didn't want it winding up on the dinner plates.

Link could only stand where he was, as Saria lifted here boot up. She angled over Link, sending a shadow over him. Link turned and ran like as fast as he could. The boot landed just behind, almost touching his back.

The force from it sent Link flying. He landed on his back, but quickly rolled over and hopped to his feet. He knew Saria thought he was a bug, so trying to get her to realze it was actually him from the ground was pointless. He made a mad dash for the space beneath her bed.

Link ran even faster, almost reaching the safe spot beneath the bed. Suddenly, the massive green boot landed in front of him. Link crashed into it and fell on his back again. He jumped to his feet. Saria lifted the bot back up, Link continued and ran for the bed.

And he...
14411112.title: Bug! Step on it!

choices: Try and get Saria's attention again
Head outside and get someone else
144111121.content:
He falls to the floor, only to look up to see the giant girl's boot come crashing down on him. All he could feel was an intense pressure that never seemed to stop. Then under the boot of his best friend, he felt the pressure lift, but yet things were still dark. "All right I got him!" The voice of the little Kokiri stated, then he felt the pressure come back and he knew where he was. He wasn't dead, but completely flat on the bottom of Saria's shoe. She then began to walk and every step Link felt flatter and flatter. He began to lose hope that he would ever fall off her shoe when she stepped in a crack in her wood floor, which caught Link and put him flat on the floor. Link just laid there, flat until his body began to re expand. After a minute of inflating Link was back to the normal stature that was his tiny, little body.

"Well that was interesting" Link said getting up from this new realization. He looked up at Saria who looked at her soup and said "Darn, I left it on too long it's burnt!" She then proceeded to take the giant pot and throw it out of her house into the nearby grass. After the long pause of just sitting there you decide that you need to do something, but what?
144111121.title: Trips and falls

choices: Link is able to fend off the spider.
Link is force to flee from under the bed.
144111122.content:
Just barely Link manages to make it under the bed just a Saria's foot came crashing down a second time. Link watched from under the bed as Saria went back to her cooking, apparently satisfied that she had destroyed the bug.

"That was way too close." Link thinks as he catches her breath, "As long as I'm under here I think I'm safe for the time being." Just as he finished that sentence Link heard a loud clicking noise coming up from behind him. Turning to see what made the noise Link spots a humongous spider clicking it's fangs like it had just spotted it's dinner.
144111122.title: Safe for Now...

1441112.content:
Saria shrugged. "It's not like Link to go without saying goodbye." Then her eyes lit up, she was probably in denial. "No, he's probably just gone to tell me how wonderful my cooking is!" She laughed and danced around the room. Link had to try not to fall over from the tremors Saria was making.
Then her expression became curious, as a Kokiri usually is, wanting to know more about the world around them, but never ever growing up. "So, I wonder what my cooking tastes like?" She picked up the ladle and sipped. But she didn't fall asleep. Link came to the conclusion that she was Kokiri, maybe she was resistant to the sleep.

However, Saria gasped and began to take a bigger gulp. Then she sat down on the floor. She rubbed her stomach with pleasure. Link ran toward her yelling to get her attention. She was already beginning to shrink but she didn't notice. When she next stood up to see where Link had gone she realised the chair was now about twice her size. And then she felt a tapping on her leg. Looking down she saw Link waving.

"What happened?" She asked as she stopped shrinking around his size.
"We've shrunk somehow."

And then, as if to make matters worse, Zelda stormed in looking for Link.

Now what happens?

144111211.content:
Looking at the floor, Zelda spied two bugs crawling around. To her, it made sense. This house was in the forest, of course there would be bugs.
"I'm sure Saria wouldn't mind if I got rid of them for her." Zelda walked over to the bugs and raised her soft foot over them.
"These bugs are acting strange. It's almost like they are trying to get my attention! How odd." This didn't stop Zelda from lowering her foot, and when both bugs were under it, she pressed down and was rewarded with a solid crunch. Satisfied, she began to look around the house for any signs of Link or Saria.

============================================================================ ===

"ZELDA! WE'RE DOWN HERE!" As Zelda entered the house and removed her shoes, Link and Saria were jumping and waving their hands to get the princess's attention. For a while, it seemed to work as Zelda walked towards their direction. However, when she lifted her foot up, the two realized something was wrong. "Saria! Move!" Link pushed Saria out of the way, and watched as the foot... Crashed down on a pair of actual bugs that were headed towards the two. A resounding crunch was heard, and Zelda proceeded to walk away.

1511.content:
Hyrule
Summit of Death Mountain
-------------------------


Link entered Death Mountain crater. It was the same as it was the first time he was here. He remembered seeing Zelda--disguised as Sheik--teach him a melody on the Ocarina of Time. If he only knew back then...Link shook his head to clear it. He was on another mission now. A few nights ago, Zelda had saw something that fell from the sky and landed somewhere on Death Mountain it looked like. So, Zelda sent the Hero of Time to check it out. Link had been searching all morning and into late afternoon for something out of the ordinary. So far, he had no luck. He only went into the crater of Death Mountain as a last resort. He didn't much like walking on rickety bridges over pools of lava.
He had been looking at a spit of rock that was surrounded by lava. The rock had a flat top, and there was something on it. It looked like a sheet of paper. Link pulled out his Long-Shot and fired it at the sheet. The Long-Shot picked it up and brought the paper to Link. Link grabbed the paper and read it. It was musical notes on a staff. The tune had 10 notes. Below the musical staff, was the name of the tune.
"Giant Melody?" asked Link quietly.

"Wow! I have to show this to Zelda!" Link roared, and jumped off the mountain, causing a quake to hit the nearby village.

She soon brought him up to her face, and Link got his first good look at her. Navi had bright blue skin and looked to be about 16, she also had a cute face and had purple hair. "WOW, YOU REALLY ARE SMALL...AND KINDA CUTE LIKE THIS..." Said Navi as she...
1542121.title: microscopic

choices: Navi wamts to leave Link in some bad predicament to get back at him.
15421211.content: "So, Link. How doesit feel now that you are the tiny one?" Said Navi, smiling. She looked at him, and it seemed like he was screaming something. He was too small for Navi to hear though. "You're so small, I don't even hear you! You're not much of an use for anyone at this size..." She said, and then got a naughty idea. "...except for me." She then looked down at the tiny Link at her toes, still trying to scream something at her. "Nope, can't hear you. Then again, it really doesn't matter what you say. You're so small and pathetic now I could crush you by flinching my toe! And when you're so small to me, to normal people you'd be nearly unseenable! As such, I decided..."
15421211.title: Contemplated having fun with Link

1542122.content:
Link awoke to a bizzare sight. Everything looked insainly bigger.

"Uhg what happend?" He said to himself."

"So you finally woke up" Said a voice from above.

Link looked up and screamed in fright. Above stood a giant 10 year old girl with short blue hair and fairy wings.

"N-Navi?" Link asked the girl that he looked 3 inches to.

"Yep thats right" Navi answered. "You know Link i think you look realy cute at that size. Let's what fun games we can play." Navi said as she grabs him in her hand.
1542122.title: Fairy-Sized to a fairy

15421221.content:
Before Link could react Navl's hand came down and snatched him up. No matter how hard the tiny hero tried he could no break the young girl's grip.

Slowly Link was brought to Navi's face where he could see she was ________ at him.
15421221.title: Navi's Mood

choices: Look for someone to help him
15422.content:
Link and Navi were traveling the land of Hyrule, looking for an ancient relict that was said to lie deep within the lost woods. They traveled for quite a while and eventually came across a large temple. Weirdly enough, there were no traps or puzzles guarding the item, which turned out to be a wan with a large jewel on top.
"That must be it! Link, we better be careful. It seems a bit too easy..." Navi warns Link as he slowly approaches the wand. He stands right in front of it and reaches out, but as soon as his fingers touch the wooden staff, the world around him starts to spin and he falls unconscious.
After a while, he slowly wakes back up. Strangely, his eyes are hit with light. Daylight. How did he get outside? Navi couldn't have done it. Or...
He suddenly realizes that the ground is soft and moves. He blinks a few times to clear his vision, only to see a pretty, blue glowing face. Its Navi. But she is suddenly gigantic! Or no... Link realizes what happened: he shrank down in size and is now merely a speck, allowing Navi to hold him in her palm.
She looks down at him. She always thought that Link was pretty, but now he's just adorable!
She probably should go get help.
Or she could just... keep him.
15422.title: Adault

info.brief_description: Characters from The Legends of Zelda series change size.
info.description:
~~~Basic Info~~~

In this story you can pick characters from the Legend Of Zelda Game series (any of them I've played most of them myself) and grow and shrink them to any size you wish.

~~~Rules~~~

-Don't make chapter that contain sex or graphic content. NO EXCEPTIONS!-
(Most of the games were rated Everyone or Teen so yeah. If you got a problem with this rule the best solution is to go make your own story If it's good enough I might I'll add to it.)

-Don't make chapter that are too short. Chapters should to be at least a paragraph or more in length-
(There are some exceptions, such as the beginning chapters for example.)

-Don't make chapter that have severe swearing, but mild-swearing is allowed.-
(Just don't use the F-word please. Seriously I don't really care about the others so much.)

-Don't use repeated ideas in chapters.-
(I see this a lot people make a chapters that basically repeat the same option that was used in a previous chapter or another story. Just make sure every chapter is fairly unique.)

~~~Editing~~~

Note: I do sometimes edit/delete chapters, if it severely needs help in spelling or grammar I'll fix it up if it gets to bad. If I edit a chapter it will have [EDIT] in the chapter title as well as the reason for the edit in green text!

~~~Update 03/16/13~~~

I made some minor changes to the story's choice format and added options for Skyward Sword stories.
info.pretty_title: The Legends of Zelda Size Changing
